name: Shadowhoof Slayer
text: Battlecry: Give your hero +1 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Was a humble Elven Archer before Sargeras got to him.

name: Crimson Sigil Runner
text: Outcast: Draw a card.
flavorText: He's not the fastest of the bunch, but he'll take a stab at it anyway.

name: Battlefiend
text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: Say what you like about my hatchet-headed hooligan, he’s my battle-friend.

name: Ur'zul Horror
text: Deathrattle: Add a 2/1 Lost Soul to your hand.
flavorText: You face face face face face Jaraxxus!

name: Sightless Watcher
text: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards in your deck. Choose one to put on top.
flavorText: What he lacks in sight, he makes up for in sleight-of-tentacle tricks.

name: Furious Felfin
text: Battlecry: If your hero attacked this turn, gain +1 Attack and Rush.
flavorText: Signature moves include Eye Bream, Feast of Soles, and Metamorphofish.

name: Netherwalker
text: Battlecry: Discover a Demon.
flavorText: You got to Nethercrawl before you can Netherwalk.

name: Redeemed Pariah
text: After you play an Outcast card, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: "Look at this stick. Look at it!"

name: Satyr Overseer
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 2/2 Satyr.
flavorText: What he lacks in communication skills, he makes up for with highly responsive staffing allocations.

name: Ace Hunter Kreen
text: Your other characters are Immune while attacking.
flavorText: This grandmaster marksman loves winning tournaments and eating a bit of ice cream.

name: Magehunter
text: Rush Whenever this attacks a minion, Silence it.
flavorText: Hates waiting. Abhors chit chat. Fond of the color purple.

name: Wrathscale Naga
text: After a friendly minion dies, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: If throwing glaives is what you crave; summon tokens and make 'em broken.

name: Felsteel Executioner
text: Corrupt: Become a weapon.
flavorText: "My mom said I could be anything I want."

name: Insatiable Felhound
text: Taunt Corrupt: Gain +1/+1 and Lifesteal.
flavorText: Back-to-back winner of the annual hot dog eating contest... and the judge-eating contest.

name: Line Hopper
text: Your Outcast cards cost (1) less.
flavorText: There are two things Demon Hunters know: hopping, and cutting.

name: Stiltstepper
text: Battlecry: Draw a card. If you play it this turn, give your hero +4 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Circus school was tough, sometimes you had to step on people to make it to the top.

name: Ashtongue Battlelord
text: Taunt Lifesteal
flavorText: Demons have destroyed the lives of the Ashtongue draenei. Now he’s got a shoulder-axe to grind.

name: Kayn Sunfury
text: Charge All friendly attacks ignore Taunt.
flavorText: "Armor and heals may slow my zeal, but fel and glaives excite me!"

name: Shardshatter Mystic
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavorText: Enjoys a good soul-crushing defeat.

name: Star Student Stelina
text: Outcast: Look at 3 cards in your opponent's hand. Shuffle one of them into their deck.
flavorText: Cheating is just using your resources wisely.

name: Vilefiend Trainer
text: Outcast: Summon two 1/1 Demons.
flavorText: My Vilefiend Trainers give me a much better sprint than my Air Gul'dans.

name: Altruis the Outcast
text: After you play the left- or right-most card in your hand, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: Altruis betrayed Illidan to forge his own way in Outland. With Blackjack. And Netherdrakes.

name: Illidari Felblade
text: Rush Outcast: Gain Immune this turn.
flavorText: A whirling dervish of demonic devastation.

name: Raging Felscreamer
text: Battlecry: The next Demon you play costs (2) less.
flavorText: Screaming loudly will not reduce the cost of non-demonic goods.

name: Felsaber
text: Can only attack if your hero attacked this turn.
flavorText: Some drivers rev their engines. This one growls all on its own.

name: Il'gynoth
text: Lifesteal Your Lifesteal damages the enemy hero instead of healing you.
flavorText: Well, that just sounds like damage with extra steps.

name: Renowned Performer
text: Rush Deathrattle: Summon two   1/1 Assistants with Taunt.
flavorText: Cutting the assistant in half is the easy part.

name: Glaivebound Adept
text: Battlecry: If your hero attacked this turn, deal 4 damage.
flavorText: "Initiate, this is your glaive. Think of it as an extension of yourself... Did you just throw it?!"

name: Blood Herald
text: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: "Red Blood, it gives you wings."

name: Soulshard Lapidary
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to give your hero +5 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Also known as a soul sequincer.

name: Wrathspike Brute
text: Taunt After this is attacked, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: You scratch her back, her back scratches back.

name: Zai, the Incredible
text: Battlecry: Copy the left- and right-most cards in your hand.
flavorText: Following this act will be her younger brother, Frank the Mediocre.

name: Fel Summoner
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random Demon from your hand.
flavorText: All's well that ends fel when the fel summoner summons well.

name: Imprisoned Antaen
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavorText: Can I get a pair of size XXXXXL manacles?

name: Bladed Lady
text: Rush Costs (1) if your hero has 6 or more Attack.
flavorText: While you were busy learning magic, she studied the blade.

name: Priestess of Fury
text: At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavorText: Furious that she only has six warglaives. The Sightless Watcher has eight! The fel is always greener on the other side.

name: Coilfang Warlord
text: Rush Deathrattle: Summon a 5/9 Warlord with Taunt.
flavorText: Prepare for the staunch conch launch!

name: Hulking Overfiend
text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
flavorText: To hulk, perhaps, to fiend: ay, there's the rub.

name: Pit Commander
text: Taunt At the end of your turn, summon a Demon from your deck.
flavorText: "Pit! Do as I say!"

name: Ancient Void Hound
text: At the end of your turn, steal 1 Attack and Health from all enemy minions.
flavorText: What happened to my 1/1 Void Pup? And the glee club?!

name: Nethrandamus
text: Battlecry: Summon two random -Cost minions. (Upgrades each time a friendly minion dies!)
flavorText: Missed the big descent with the other dragons. But better late and nether!

name: Acornbearer
text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Squirrels to your hand.
flavorText: You’d be nuts to mess with the squirrel squad.

name: Gibberling
text: Spellburst: Summon a Gibberling.
flavorText: "As a Linguistics student I have studied the Gibberlings. I have determined they are speaking Gibberish."

name: Keeper Stalladris
text: After you cast a Choose One spell, add copies of both choices to your hand.
flavorText: Keeps your choices handy.

name: Crystal Merchant
text: If you have any unspent Mana at the end of your turn, draw a card.
flavorText: I won't ask about your mana curve if you don't ask where I got these.

name: Shrubadier
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Treant.
flavorText: Her shoots can kill.

name: Steel Beetle
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, gain 5 Armor.
flavorText: Steel you can trust—fashioned from the husk of an over-sized creepy-crawly.

name: Lifeweaver
text: Whenever you restore Health, add a random Druid spell to your hand.
flavorText: Lifeweaving is all well and good until it's time to cut the thread.

name: Archspore Msshi'fn
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Msshi'fn Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: Brave leader of the Sporeggar. Guided by the philosophy that one should not mssh with matters that are not one's msshiness.

name: Imprisoned Satyr
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (5).
flavorText: "C'mon down to Illhoof's bargain bin! When the satyr's free, he'll lower your fee!"

name: Dreaming Drake
text: Taunt Corrupt: Gain +2/+2.
flavorText: Some dragons dream of conquering Azeroth, some just dream of being 5/6s.

name: Faire Arborist
text: Choose One - Draw a card; or Summon a 2/2 Treant. Corrupt: Do both.
flavorText: The bad apple never falls far from the treant.

name: Keeper of the Grove
text: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Silence a minion.
flavorText: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

name: Garden Gnome
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, summon two 2/2 Treants.
flavorText: "Greetings, my little shrubs... It's whittlin' time."

name: Groundskeeper
text: Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, restore 5 Health.
flavorText: It’s tricky for dryads to tend the garden without trampling the flowers.

name: Kiri, Chosen of Elune
text: Battlecry: Add a Solar Eclipse and Lunar Eclipse to your hand.
flavorText: Now, when the Sun is between the Moon and the Azeroth... that's when you've got a problem.

name: Druid of the Claw
text: Choose One - Transform into a 4/4 with Charge; or a 4/6 with Taunt.
flavorText: Cat or Bear? Cat or Bear?! I just cannot CHOOSE!

name: Crystal Stag
text: Rush. Battlecry: If you've restored 5 Health this game, summon a copy of this. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: Arrives alone, but usually leaves with a friend just like him.

name: Anubisath Defender
text: Taunt. Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
flavorText: Also comes running when he hears a can opener.

name: Elise the Enlightened
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, duplicate your hand.
flavorText: From cartographer to combatant, Elise has taken the road less traveled—because no one else could find it on a map.

name: Oasis Surger
text: Rush Choose One - Gain +2/+2; or Summon a copy of this minion.
flavorText: Surge's up, dude!

name: Twilight Runner
text: Stealth Whenever this attacks, draw 2 cards.
flavorText: Every morning you find two dead cards at your doorstep.

name: Greybough
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon Greybough."
flavorText: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The next best time is when you lose a minion.

name: Emerald Explorer
text: Taunt Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavorText: Make it a double dragon!

name: Forest Warden Omu
text: Spellburst: Refresh your Mana Crystals.
flavorText: She wishes all things could grow and flourish at Scholomance. If only she knew…

name: Ancient of Lore
text: Choose One - Draw a card; or Restore 5 Health.
flavorText: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

name: Ancient of War
text: Choose One - +5 Attack; or +5 Health and Taunt.
flavorText: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?" You lose if you get crushed to death.

name: Goru the Mightree
text: Taunt Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Treants have +1/+1.
flavorText: He's untreefeated.

name: Winged Guardian
text: Taunt, Reborn Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavorText: Take these broken wings, be reborn, and learn to fly again.

name: Marsh Hydra
text: Rush After this attacks, add a random 8-Cost minion to your hand.
flavorText: Three heads of marsh-mashing, bog-bashing, swamp-stomping fury!

name: Umbral Owl
text: Rush Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast this game.
flavorText: It sleeps with one eye open.

name: Ironbark Protector
text: Taunt
flavorText: I dare you to attack Darnassus.

name: Lucentbark
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Restore 5 Health to awaken this minion.
flavorText: Always feels refreshed after a little dirt nap.

name: Cenarius
text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
flavorText: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

name: Ysera, Unleashed
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 7 Dream Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a random Dragon.
flavorText: Releash the Dragon!

name: Ysiel Windsinger
text: Your spells cost (1).
flavorText: Reach down into your lungs. The wind that resides there is your greatest treasure. It provides the gift of song, which is free. *But not less than (1)

name: Fizzy Elemental
text: Rush Taunt
flavorText: Loved. Hated. Carbonated.

name: Timber Wolf
text: Your other Beasts have +1 Attack.
flavorText: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

name: Shimmerfly
text: Deathrattle: Add a random Hunter spell to your hand.
flavorText: Plenty of buzz around this card.

name: Dwarven Sharpshooter
text: Your Hero Power can target minions.
flavorText: Scissors, knives, needles, you name it! He'll shoot it.

name: Helboar
text: Deathrattle: Give a random Beast in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: Beasts love Helbacon Strips!

name: Wolpertinger
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
flavorText: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone awry.

name: Mystery Winner
text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret.
flavorText: Yeah, but the mystery prize could be anything! Even a boat!

name: Scavenging Hyena
text: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +2/+1.
flavorText: Hyenas prefer the bones of kodos or windserpents, but they'll eat pretty much anything. Even Brussels sprouts.

name: Phase Stalker
text: After you use your Hero Power, cast a Secret from your deck.
flavorText: It's not just a phase! I don't have to tell you anything! GAWSH!

name: Imprisoned Felmaw
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens,   attack a random enemy.
flavorText: It doesn't care who woke it up, someone's getting bitten.

name: Dancing Cobra
text: Corrupt: Gain Poisonous.
flavorText: Snakes are just tentacles with fangs.

name: Ursatron
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Mech from your deck.
flavorText: It's been programmed to include all the bear necessities.

name: Ramkahen Wildtamer
text: Battlecry: Copy a random Beast in your hand.
flavorText: She gets to decide what cards go to the Hall of Fame.

name: Diving Gryphon
text: Rush Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion from your deck.
flavorText: Warning: May cause carousel flashbacks.

name: Primordial Explorer
text: Poisonous Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavorText: "We're letting the poisonous dude carry the bags?"

name: Chopshop Copter
text: After a friendly Mech dies, add a random Mech to your hand.
flavorText: Invention is the mother of entropy.

name: Augmented Porcupine
text: Deathrattle: Deal this minion's Attack damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavorText: Pokey-man. Gotta spike 'em all!

name: Zixor, Apex Predator
text: Rush Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Zixor Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: A living terror. Teleports at will. Feasts on tainted helboar meat. No head scritches unless you're Leoroxx.

name: Bloated Python
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Hapless Handler.
flavorText: This is why Scholomance engineering students prefer C++.

name: Professor Slate
text: Your spells are Poisonous.
flavorText: "Don’t worry, this will be over in a second. It might FEEL like an eternity, but I assure you, it’s quite quick!"

name: Shan'do Wildclaw
text: Choose One - Give Beasts in your deck +1/+1; or Transform into a copy of a friendly Beast.
flavorText: She holds both an academic post and a scratching post.

name: Saddlemaster
text: After you play a Beast, add a random Beast to your hand.
flavorText: Seat covers. Check. Racing stripes. Check. Cupholder. Check.

name: Houndmaster
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2 and Taunt.
flavorText: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks. It's rhetorical.

name: Arcane Fletcher
text: Whenever you play a 1-Cost minion, draw a spell from your deck.
flavorText: Stop trying to make fletch happen. It's not going to happen.

name: Hyena Alpha
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
flavorText: Everything the sun touches is ours—so long as it's already dead.

name: Dragonbane
text: After you use your Hero Power, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: *Thunk* "That wasn’t a dragon!" *Thunk* "THAT wasn’t a dragon!"

name: Mok'Nathal Lion
text: Rush. Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Gain a copy of its Deathrattle.
flavorText: Never underestimate a lioness when her pride is on the line.

name: Krolusk Barkstripper
text: Spellburst: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavorText: My friend went krolusk tipping once… once!

name: Starving Buzzard
text: Whenever you summon a Beast, draw a card.
flavorText: If you feed him, he loses his whole identity.

name: Tundra Rhino
text: Your Beasts have Charge.
flavorText: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos. Or am I mistaken?

name: Rotnest Drake
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Clean your room, or I'm taking your favorite minion away!

name: Teacher's Pet
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a random 3-Cost Beast.
flavorText: Really goes the extra mile to get the Hay+.

name: Trampling Rhino
text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, excess damage hits the enemy hero.
flavorText: "Whew. I thought you said 'Trampoline Rhino.' Now that would have been scary."

name: Savannah Highmane
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
flavorText: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

name: Oblivitron
text: Deathrattle: Summon a Mech from your hand and trigger its Deathrattle.
flavorText: Reduce, reuse, re-rattle!

name: Scarlet Webweaver
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random Beast in your hand by (5).
flavorText: Isn't that nice? The spider made the explorer a sleeping bag!

name: Wild Bloodstinger
text: Battlecry: Summon a minion from your opponent's hand. Attack it.
flavorText: Tame Bloodstingers would politely invite your minion to tea.

name: Veranus
text: Battlecry: Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
flavorText: As an empty nester, she just misses her little ones.

name: Maxima Blastenheimer
text: Battlecry: Summon a minion from your deck. It attacks the enemy hero, then dies.
flavorText: Believe it or not, this is only the faire's fourth most dangerous game.

name: Vereesa Windrunner
text: Battlecry: Equip Thori'dal, the Stars' Fury.
flavorText: Good things come in threes: Windrunner sisters and arrows of Thori'dal.

name: Darkmoon Tonk
text: Deathrattle: Fire four missiles at random enemies that deal 2 damage each.
flavorText: "Ready to roll out!"

name: Dinotamer Brann
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon King Krush.
flavorText: Brann's new dino-taming hobby is going well—his pet can already make him sit, stand, and roll over!

name: Beastmaster Leoroxx
text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Beasts from your hand.
flavorText: Father of Rexxar, Champion of the Horde, and Flexxar, Champion of the Gym.

name: King Krush
text: Charge
flavorText: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

name: Violet Spellwing
text: Deathrattle: Add an 'Arcane Missiles' spell to your hand.
flavorText: A bird in the hand is worth three missiles in the grave.

name: Lab Partner
text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: "Professor, a gnome burned my homework!"

name: Glacier Racer
text: Spellburst: Deal 3 damage to all Frozen enemies.
flavorText: It’s just not the same without a super suit.

name: Mana Wyrm
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
text: Your spells cost (1) less.
flavorText: Apprentices are great for bossing around. "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee! Make that a mana coffee!"

name: Khadgar
text: Your cards that summon minions summon twice as many.
flavorText: "What do you call two minions summoned at once? Twinions, haha! Wait... where are you going?"

name: Magic Dart Frog
text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavorText: There's a powerful throat in this frog.

name: Mana Cyclone
text: Battlecry: For each spell you've cast this turn, add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavorText: It'll put a good spin on your spells.

name: Arcane Flakmage
text: After you play a Secret, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: Ancient pandaren proverb: He who is without secrets lacks flak.

name: Apexis Smuggler
text: After you play a Secret, Discover a spell.
flavorText: "S-secrets? I don't have any! Whoa, look, a spell!"

name: Astromancer Solarian
text: Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Solarian Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: Loyal to Kael'thas Sunstrider, this blood elf mage sought arcane power in the Void. Did she find it... or did IT find her?

name: Starscryer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a spell.
flavorText: Often grieves with the Starsweeper.

name: Confection Cyclone
text: Battlecry: Add two 1/2 Sugar Elementals to your hand.
flavorText: "Oh, I thought it was a desert elemental?"

name: Game Master
text: The first Secret you play each turn costs (1).
flavorText: "You hear the mrgrgls of angry murlocs approaching. Roll initiative!"

name: Kirin Tor Mage
text: Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
flavorText: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran. How do you make a Dalaran float? Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

name: Messenger Raven
text: Battlecry: Discover a Mage minion.
flavorText: You can make a collect CAW!

name: Dune Sculptor
text: After you cast a spell, add a random Mage minion to your hand.
flavorText: Come for the magic show, stay for the sand castles.

name: Chenvaala
text: After you cast three spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Elemental.
flavorText: Like the Dragon Soul. If dragons had souls of ice.

name: Arcane Amplifier
text: Your Hero Power deals 2 extra damage.
flavorText: Not on good terms with warlocks.

name: Imprisoned Observer
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: Currently serving two turns on charges of aggravated minion slaughter.

name: Firebrand
text: Spellburst: Deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavorText: Too cool for school, too hot for thought.

name: Water Elemental
text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavorText: Don't summon a water elemental at a party. It'll dampen the mood.

name: Ethereal Arcanist
text: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

name: Kirin Tor Tricaster
text: Spell Damage +3 Your spells cost (1) more.
flavorText: The math checks out!

name: Azure Explorer
text: Spell Damage +2 Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavorText: Has an appetite for knowledge!

name: Occult Conjurer
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, summon a copy of this.
flavorText: Like mirror image, but more secretive and angsty.

name: Cloud Prince
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 6 damage.
flavorText: "In West Cloudidelphia, born and raised; flinging lightning for the rest of my days."

name: Naga Sand Witch
text: Battlecry: Change the Cost of spells in your hand to (5).
flavorText: 5 mana footlong, anyone?

name: Malygos, Aspect of Magic
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover an upgraded Mage spell.
flavorText: It's official. We can say Malygeese.

name: Mozaki, Master Duelist
text: After you cast a spell, gain Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: Treats her students like her peers, which means defeating them in one-sided duels all day long.

name: Wyrm Weaver
text: Spellburst: Summon two 1/3 Mana Wyrms.
flavorText: Studied basket weaving as an undergrad.

name: Firework Elemental
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Corrupt: Deal 12 instead.
flavorText: The brightest spark can still go dark.

name: Reno the Relicologist
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavorText: All his life, Reno Jackson was only a gatling wand away from becoming the greatest and most terrifying mage who ever existed.

name: Sayge, Seer of Darkmoon
text: Battlecry: Draw (card, cards). (Upgraded for each friendly Secret that has triggered this game!)
flavorText: There are no secrets between us... or refunds.

name: Archmage Antonidas
text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to your hand.
flavorText: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor. This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

name: Dragoncaster
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, your next spell this turn costs (0).
flavorText: It’s challenging to perform magic on dragonback. It’s so easy to drop the rabbit.

name: Animated Avalanche
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon a copy of this.
flavorText: Always sliding down mountains because it can't stop talking with its hands.

name: Tortollan Pilgrim
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell in your deck and cast it with random targets.
flavorText: A tortollan made it to the desert!

name: Mana Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each card you've played this game that didn't start in your deck.
flavorText: Spell more and save more with a GIANT discount!

name: Kalecgos
text: Your first spell each turn costs (0). Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavorText: He was once the Aspect of Magic but gave it up to focus on cheap tricks.

name: Brazen Zealot
text: Whenever you summon a minion, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: Some paladins really Light it up.

name: Aldor Attendant
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of your Librams by (1) this game.
flavorText: Will check to make sure you have a valid libramary card.

name: Imprisoned Sungill
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, summon two 1/1 Murlocs.
flavorText: Imprisoned for ten thousand years! Not because it's a demon. Because of the dancing.

name: Argent Protector
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.
flavorText: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs. I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

name: Micro Mummy
text: Reborn At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
flavorText: The dramatically detailed terrifically trimmed replica of the real thing!

name: Sandwasp Queen
text: Battlecry: Add two 2/1 Sandwasps to your hand.
flavorText: Oooh, see that wasp! Watch that sting! Dig in the Sandwasp Queen!

name: Sir Finley of the Sands
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, Discover an upgraded Hero Power.
flavorText: "The sands shall be my sea! And this scarab shall be my, er, strange and wriggly boat!"

name: Shotbot
text: Reborn
flavorText: Impact detected. Assuming hero pose.

name: Murgur Murgurgle
text: Divine Shield Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Murgurgle Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: Murlocs are not native to Outland. When the Sungills arrived, one among them rose to the challenge of this dark world. They call him... Murgurgle. Murgur Murgurgle.

name: Argent Braggart
text: Battlecry: Gain Attack and Health to match the highest in the battlefield.
flavorText: Not sure why he's bragging, he's got the same stats as the next guy.

name: Redscale Dragontamer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Dragon.
flavorText: Sir Finley made this look a lot easier three expansions ago...

name: Aldor Peacekeeper
text: Battlecry: Change an enemy minion's Attack to 1.
flavorText: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

name: Bronze Herald
text: Deathrattle: Add two 4/4 Dragons to your hand.
flavorText: This is why you shouldn’t shoot the messenger.

name: Commander Rhyssa
text: Your Secrets trigger twice.
flavorText: Two people can keep a secret as long as neither of them are Commander Rhyssa.

name: Salhet's Pride
text: Deathrattle: Draw two 1-Health minions from your deck.
flavorText: Pride cometh before the maul.

name: Bronze Explorer
text: Lifesteal Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavorText: Always ready to explore new friendships! Except with Deathwing.

name: Dragonrider Talritha
text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +3/+3 and this Deathrattle.
flavorText: You can't just run away from your problems. Unless you have another dragon to jump to.

name: Sky Claw
text: Your other Mechs have +1 Attack. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Microcopters.
flavorText: Carefully engineered to never grab the Mimiron plush toy.

name: Goody Two-Shields
text: Divine Shield Spellburst: Gain Divine Shield.
flavorText: These are my shields. There are at least two like them, and both are mine.

name: Lord Barov
text: Battlecry: Set the Health of all other minions to 1. Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavorText: Alexei Barov stayed at Scholomance despite leasing it to Kel’Thuzad. He says it’s for "supervision."

name: Carnival Barker
text: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it +1/+2.
flavorText: The barking initially confused faire-goers, so he switched to words.

name: Imprisoned Celestial
text: Dormant for 2 turns. Spellburst: Give your minions Divine Shield.
flavorText: "Look at your deck, now back to me, now back at your deck, now back to me. Who am I? None of your—I'm on a horse."

name: Ancestral Guardian
text: Lifesteal Reborn
flavorText: No one knows whose ancestor he is, but he's still upset that you never call.

name: Lightforged Zealot
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, equip a   4/2 Truesilver Champion.
flavorText: Card-carrying member of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

name: Nozdormu the Timeless
text: Battlecry: Set each player to 10 Mana Crystals.
flavorText: Time is mana!

name: High Abbess Alura
text: Spellburst: Cast a spell from your deck (targets this if possible).
flavorText: She's all about hitting the books. Literally.

name: Balloon Merchant
text: Battlecry: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +1 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavorText: It's a shiny yellow balloon! But it can be popped with a single point of damage.

name: Dragon Speaker
text: Battlecry: Give all Dragons in your hand +3/+3.
flavorText: All of his speeches really drag on.

name: Amber Watcher
text: Battlecry: Restore 8 Health.
flavorText: Healing really resin-ates with him.

name: Scalelord
text: Battlecry: Give your Murlocs Divine Shield.
flavorText: It's about what they have in common, not what makes them different.

name: Aldor Truthseeker
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of your Librams by (2) this game.
flavorText: It’s under 'T.'

name: Carousel Gryphon
text: Divine Shield Corrupt: Gain +3/+3 and Taunt.
flavorText: "When does this bird land in Stormwind? I've been flying for hours!"

name: Lothraxion the Redeemed
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after you summon a Silver Hand Recruit, give it Divine Shield.
flavorText: So infused with the Light, he has to wear double sleep masks at night.

name: Devout Pupil
text: Divine Shield, Taunt Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast on friendly characters this game.
flavorText: He considers textbooks Light reading.

name: Judicious Junior
text: Lifesteal
flavorText: She's judge, jury, and junior!

name: Guardian of Kings
text: Battlecry: Restore 6 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

name: Lightforged Crusader
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, add 5 random Paladin cards to your hand.
flavorText: Self-appointed president of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

name: Lady Liadrin
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of each spell you cast on friendly characters this game to your hand.
flavorText: When it comes to spells, she loves 'em then she librams.

name: Tirion Fordring
text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
flavorText: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

name: Turalyon, the Tenured
text: Rush. Whenever this attacks a minion, set the defender's Attack and Health to 3.
flavorText: "Let evil flee before righteousness; let the innocent live in peace. Let the day come when none need fear. For that day, I give my life gladly."

name: High Exarch Yrel
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, gain Rush, Lifesteal, Taunt, and Divine Shield.
flavorText: There can be no neutrality in the fight against darkness.

name: Nozari
text: Battlecry: Restore both heroes to full Health.
flavorText: In another timeline, she was called Yeszari.

name: Psychic Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Copy a card in your opponent’s deck and add it to your hand.
flavorText: "I see... a WISP? Why do you have a wisp?!"

name: Scarlet Subjugator
text: Battlecry: Give an enemy minion -2 Attack until your next turn.
flavorText: At the Scarlet Monastery, he learned the sacred art of kicking people when they're up.

name: Disciple of Galakrond
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavorText: Raising Galakrond will cause thurible, thurible damage.

name: Cleric of Scales
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell from your deck.
flavorText: If she can't find a spell, it's a clerical error.

name: Imprisoned Homunculus
text: Dormant for 2 turns. Taunt
flavorText: He got a time out for excessive vulgarity.

name: Reliquary of Souls
text: Lifesteal Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Reliquary Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: These three represent Anger, Desire, and Suffering. Much like raid night guild chat.

name: Frazzled Freshman
flavorText: "Late to bed, early to rise, makes a student unable to open her eyes."

name: Kul Tiran Chaplain
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavorText: The maritime Kul Tiran clergy are unique among priests for using holy saltwater.

name: Lightwell
text: At the start of your turn, restore 3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavorText: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

name: EVIL Conscripter
text: Deathrattle: Add a Lackey to your hand.
flavorText: Kobold! There’s a place you can handle I said kobold! When you’re short in the candle Cast a spell with the E! V! I! L!

name: Shadowy Figure
text: Battlecry: Transform into a 2/2 copy of a friendly Deathrattle minion.
flavorText: Terrible at shadow puppets: “This is… a tentacle! And this is… two tentacles!”

name: Grandmummy
text: Reborn Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavorText: A grandmummy’s love is eternal.

name: Envoy of Lazul
text: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one is in your opponent's hand to get a copy of it.
flavorText: "Note to self: possess someone who's local and knows directions next time."

name: Dragonmaw Sentinel
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Lifesteal.
flavorText: On the side, she's training for the annual Dragonmaw hammer throw tournament.

name: Sethekk Veilweaver
text: After you cast a spell on a minion, add a Priest spell to your hand.
flavorText: The Sethekk weren't able to survive this long by being wasteful with their power. Or their wacky hats.

name: Madame Lazul
text: Battlecry: Discover a copy of a card in your opponent's hand.
flavorText: Of course she knows the future, she’s been looking at your cards the WHOLE TIME!

name: Wretched Reclaimer
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion, then return it to life with full Health.
flavorText: "Ok, here's the plan. We kill you, then bring you back." "Stronger?" "No, about the same."

name: Mindflayer Kaahrj
text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Deathrattle: Summon a new copy of it.
flavorText: It’s pronounced "Kaahrj."

name: Dragonmaw Overseer
text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly minion +2/+2.
flavorText: Ah, the Booterang... nothing cures peon laziness faster.

name: Mindrender Illucia
text: Battlecry: Swap hands and decks with your opponent until your next turn.
flavorText: "…and that's how I ended up with a Murloc Cultural Studies major."

name: Fairground Fool
text: Taunt Corrupt: Gain +4 Health.
flavorText: "What did Illidan say when his rocketeer broke down on the Darkmoon racetrack? YOU ARE NOT REPAIRED!"

name: Nazmani Bloodweaver
text: After you cast a spell, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by (1).
flavorText: Her first stage name, Ketchupweaver, failed to excite the audience.

name: Lightspawn
text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
flavorText: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

name: Hench-Clan Shadequill
text: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
flavorText: The Hench-Clan has a point.

name: High Priest Amet
text: Whenever you summon a minion, set its Health equal to this minion's.
flavorText: All minions are equal, but some minions are more equal than others.

name: Psychopomp
text: Battlecry: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game. Give it Reborn.
flavorText: "Come with me if you want to re-live."

name: Fate Weaver
text: Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
flavorText: Do not draw the attention of a Fate Weaver, for it will always loom over your destiny.

name: Brittlebone Destroyer
text: Battlecry: If your hero's Health changed this turn, destroy a minion.
flavorText: Broke many a leg in drama class.

name: Cabal Acolyte
text: Taunt Spellburst: Gain control of a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
flavorText: How did he get to the top of his class? He pulled a few strings!

name: Disciplinarian Gandling
text: After you play a minion, destroy it and summon a 4/4 Failed Student.
flavorText: "He doesn’t grade on a curve, but on a sharp spike instead."

name: Lightsteed
text: Your healing effects also give affected minions +2 Health.
flavorText: All the steed, half the calories.

name: The Nameless One
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Become a 4/4 copy of it, then Silence it.
flavorText: Used to be called " , the Nameless," but everyone got confused.

name: Temple Enforcer
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
flavorText: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

name: Convincing Infiltrator
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavorText: It’s always nice to steal a familiar face.

name: Sandhoof Waterbearer
text: At the end of your turn, restore 5 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavorText: Used to carrying for his team.

name: Chronobreaker
text: Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: If he asks to borrow your watch, just say no.

name: Dark Inquisitor Xanesh
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of all Corrupt cards in your hand and deck by (2).
flavorText: Fear is the mind-killer, and also the name of my wurm.

name: Fortune Teller
text: Taunt Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each spell in your hand.
flavorText: "I see a giant piano in your future."

name: Cabal Shadow Priest
text: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion that has 2 or less Attack.
flavorText: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

name: Aeon Reaver
text: Battlecry: Deal damage to a minion equal to its Attack.
flavorText: Ripping centuries asunder helps him manage his busy schedule.

name: Skeletal Dragon
text: Taunt At the end of your turn, add a Dragon to your hand.
flavorText: I wish to complain about this dragon what I purchased not half an hour ago from this very boutique.

name: Natalie Seline
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and gain its Health.
flavorText: She discovered Xal'atath, Blade of the Black Empire, a terrible weapon of shadow magic that could both swallow a soul and cut a mean julienne.

name: Catrina Muerte
text: At the end of your turn, summon a friendly minion that died this game.
flavorText: She always manages to lift your spirits.

name: Murozond the Infinite
text: Battlecry: Play all cards your opponent played last turn.
flavorText: "Well, I'm glad YOU knew what I should be doing this turn."

name: Flesh Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each time your hero's Health changed during your turns.
flavorText: "A BIG mistake."

name: G'huun the Blood God
text: Battlecry: Draw 2 cards. They cost Health instead of Mana.
flavorText: All of the other Old Gods used to laugh and call him names. They never let poor G'huun join in any Old God games.

name: Blood of G'huun
text: Taunt At the end of your turn, summon a 5/5 copy of a minion in your deck.
flavorText: An attempted cure becomes disease, blooming and thriving as rot and decay.

name: Pharaoh Cat
text: Battlecry: Add a random Reborn minion to your hand.
flavorText: Mightiest of mousers, enduring in kingship of the upper and lower cat tree, conqueror of the red dot, the all-wise Catshepsut.

name: Bloodsail Flybooter
text: Battlecry: Add two 1/1 Pirates to your hand.
flavorText: They’re pretty fly for some pirate guys.

name: Blackjack Stunner
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, return a minion to its owner's hand. It costs (1) more.
flavorText: "I'm about to ruin this 10-cost minion's whole career."

name: Spymistress
text: Stealth
flavorText: Spies in Outland must blend into the environment. That means hot-pink gear and bright green hair. It’s a weird place.

name: Prize Plunderer
text: Combo: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each other card you've played this turn.
flavorText: But he'll never be able to plunder the prize of a happy childhood.

name: Defias Ringleader
text: Combo: Summon a 2/1 Defias Bandit.
flavorText: He stole the deed to town years ago, so technically the town is his. He just calls people Scrub to be mean.

name: Patient Assassin
text: Stealth Poisonous
flavorText: He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

name: Underbelly Fence
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a card from another class,  gain +1/+1 and Rush.
flavorText: She’ll take anything you have—except scruples and a good work ethic.

name: Whirlkick Master
text: Whenever you play a Combo card, add a random Combo card to your hand.
flavorText: C-c-combo!

name: Skyvateer
text: Stealth Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavorText: When you go without fruits in an airship, you get a nasty case of skyvy.

name: Ashtongue Slayer
text: Battlecry: Give a Stealthed minion +3 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavorText: Her other hand attachments include a corkscrew and a bottle opener.

name: Shadowjeweler Hanar
text: After you play a Secret, Discover a Secret from a different class.
flavorText: What is a shadowjeweler? A miserable little pile of secrets.

name: Foxy Fraud
text: Battlecry: Your next Combo card this turn costs (2) less.
flavorText: His other street con involves a druid. He can't pull it off without a plant.

name: Sweet Tooth
text: Corrupt: Gain +2 Attack and Stealth.
flavorText: He's been eyeballing that ice cream cone all day!

name: Tenwu of the Red Smoke
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (1) this turn.
flavorText: Red, the color of subtlety.

name: SI:7 Agent
text: Combo: Deal 2 damage.
flavorText: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities. Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

name: EVIL Miscreant
text: Combo: Add two random Lackeys to your hand.
flavorText: Because there are no G.O.O.D. Miscreants.

name: Akama
text: Stealth Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Akama Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: "To many of my people, I am known as a traitor... as Illidan's lapdog. I will remain in the shadows, for now... Actually, maybe I'll just remain in the shadows forever."

name: Greyheart Sage
text: Battlecry: If you control a Stealthed minion, draw 2 cards.
flavorText: "What am I drinking again?"

name: Vulpera Toxinblade
text: Your weapon has +2 Attack.
flavorText: The blade works well enough on its own… but this is just in case.

name: Sparkjoy Cheat
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Secret, cast it and draw a card.
flavorText: "These do NOT spark joy!"

name: Ticket Master
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle 3 Tickets into your deck. When drawn, summon a 3/3 Plush Bear.
flavorText: You can exchange one ticket for a bear or save up thousands for a tacky light-up paperweight!

name: Plaguebringer
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Poisonous.
flavorText: One sip and you've got the grippe.

name: Edwin VanCleef
text: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each other card you've played this turn.
flavorText: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.

name: Master of Disguise
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.
flavorText: She's actually a male tauren. People don't call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

name: Hench-Clan Burglar
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class.
flavorText: She’s more of a rat burglar.

name: Sahket Sapper
text: Deathrattle: Return a  random enemy minion to  your opponent's hand.
flavorText: "Here, you dropped this."

name: Umbral Skulker
text: Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, add 3 Coins to your hand.
flavorText: "Three gold?! Do you have any idea how long this quest chain was?"

name: Infiltrator Lilian
text: Stealth Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Forsaken Lilian that attacks a random enemy.
flavorText: She'll get to the bottom of this even if it kills her. Twice!

name: Shifty Sophomore
text: Stealth Spellburst: Add a Combo card to your hand.
flavorText: Experienced enough to do crimes, inexperienced enough to be super obvious about it.

name: Anka, the Buried
text: Battlecry: Change each Deathrattle minion in your hand into a 1/1 that costs (1).
flavorText: "You look familiar. Were you at my first funeral?"

name: Bazaar Mugger
text: Rush Battlecry: Add a random minion from another class to your hand.
flavorText: Premium muggings at a discount price.

name: Necrium Apothecary
text: Combo: Draw a Deathrattle minion from your deck and gain its Deathrattle.
flavorText: Necrium: Get the afterlife without the aftertaste!

name: Stowaway
text: Battlecry: If there are cards in your deck that didn't start there, draw 2 of them.
flavorText: Cut him a break. Even economy class tickets are pretty expensive these days.

name: Waxadred
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a Candle into your deck that resummons Waxadred when drawn.
flavorText: Waxadred the dragon fought for his king, frolicking through the fields melting everything!

name: Shadow Sculptor
text: Combo: Draw a card for each card you've played this turn.
flavorText: Carving out new territory in the realm of shadow puppetry.

name: Kidnapper
text: Combo: Return a minion to its owner's hand.
flavorText: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

name: Heistbaron Togwaggle
text: Battlecry: If you control a Lackey, choose a fantastic treasure.
flavorText: A staunch ally of Rafaam, at least while the shinies keep flowing.

name: Flik Skyshiv
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and all copies of it (wherever they are).
flavorText: Junior explorers scan the night sky in fear of her candle’s flame!

name: Grand Empress Shek'zara
text: Battlecry: Discover a card in your deck and draw all copies of it.
flavorText: So is a Grand Empress an empress that's grand or an empress's empress?

name: Tak Nozwhisker
text: Whenever you shuffle a card into your deck, add a copy to your hand.
flavorText: "One for me and one for future me!"

name: Cursed Vagrant
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 7/5 Shadow with Stealth.
flavorText: Little did he know… it was really the talbuk leg that was cursed.

name: Dust Devil
text: Windfury. Overload: (2)
flavorText: Westfall is full of dust devils. And buzzards. And crazed golems. And pirates. Why does anyone live here?

name: Sludge Slurper
text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand. Overload: (1)
flavorText: You can't stop slurping this delicious sludge!

name: Surging Tempest
text: Has +1 Attack while you have Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavorText: "Overloaded? Should've gotten a surge protector."

name: Underbelly Angler
text: After you play a Murloc, add a random Murloc to your hand.
flavorText: Attracts murlocs… and moths.

name: EVIL Totem
text: At the end of your turn, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavorText: A lot of people blame the parents when a totem goes bad.

name: Sandstorm Elemental
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (1)
flavorText: Doot doot doot doot doot [Pause] Doot doot doot doot doot DEE doot doot doot doot doot!

name: Diligent Notetaker
text: Spellburst: Return the spell to your hand.
flavorText: You never know what cards are going to be on the test.

name: Cagematch Custodian
text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon.
flavorText: Cleans up after a dust up.

name: Flametongue Totem
text: Adjacent minions have +2 Attack.
flavorText: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems. There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

name: Mana Tide Totem
text: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
flavorText: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin' totem" 10 times, fast.

name: Unbound Elemental
text: Whenever you play a card with Overload, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.

name: Weaponized Wasp
text: Battlecry: If you control a Lackey, deal 3 damage.
flavorText: Dr. Boom had one simple request: wasps with flippin' laser beams attached to their heads.

name: Bogstrok Clacker
text: Battlecry: Transform adjacent minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
flavorText: This clacker's crackers for hacking slackers into whack attackers.

name: Lady Vashj
text: Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Vashj Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: Personal handmaiden to Queen Azshara turned lieutenant to Illidan Stormrage. Also quite the hair sssstylist.

name: Marshspawn
text: Battlecry: If you cast a spell last turn, Discover a spell.
flavorText: Hopes to someday promote to Marshsqueen.

name: Instructor Fireheart
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (1) or more. If you play it this turn, repeat this effect.
flavorText: When you have fire in your heart, even death can't stop you.

name: Grand Totem Eys'or
text: At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all other Totems in your hand, deck and battlefield.
flavorText: Some say it can see straight into the soul of any who dare to read its flavor text...

name: Magicfin
text: After a friendly Murloc dies, add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
flavorText: The best part is when he pulls Deathwing out of a top hat!

name: Pit Master
text: Battlecry: Summon a 3/2 Duelist. Corrupt: Summon two.
flavorText: If you win your duel, he'll throw in some of his famous Pit Master barbecue.

name: Windspeaker
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Windfury.
flavorText: Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

name: Scargil
text: Your Murlocs cost (1).
flavorText: Wanna know how he got those scars? So does he.

name: Vessina
text: While you're Overloaded, your other minions have +2 Attack.
flavorText: She wasn't happy when Hagatha sent her back to Uldum. But her "angry" hiss sounds like her "happy" hiss, so no one knew the difference.

name: Squallhunter
text: Spell Damage +2 Overload: (2)
flavorText: "Oh, the weather outside is frightful… But Squallhunter's so delightful! And since we've gone down this road--overload, overload, overload!"

name: Earth Elemental
text: Taunt Overload: (3)
flavorText: Nothing beats rock.

name: Muckmorpher
text: Battlecry: Transform into a 4/4 copy of a different minion in your deck.
flavorText: Fan favorite in the muck morphin' sewer strangers.

name: Bandersmosh
text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a 5/5 copy of a random Legendary minion.
flavorText: The Shudderwock finds him particularly frumious.

name: Cumulo-Maximus
text: Battlecry: If you have Overloaded Mana Crystals, deal 5 damage.
flavorText: "Are your clouds not entertained?!"

name: Shattered Rumbler
text: Battlecry: If you cast a spell last turn, deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavorText: HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO THE GROUND!

name: Totem Goliath
text: Deathrattle: Summon all four basic Totems. Overload: (1)
flavorText: It was an art project, and nobody knew when to stop.

name: Inara Stormcrash
text: On your turn, your hero has +2 Attack and Windfury.
flavorText: A fan favorite, Inara is always met with thunderous applause.

name: Mistrunner
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3/+3. Overload: (1)
flavorText: "Get IT off me!!!"

name: Fire Elemental
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage.
flavorText: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

name: Corrupt Elementalist
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond twice.
flavorText: Her element is "Horns."

name: Nithogg
text: Battlecry: Summon two 0/3 Eggs. Next turn they hatch into 4/4 Drakes with Rush.
flavorText: Not to be confused with Nithogger.

name: The Lurker Below
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to an enemy minion. If it dies, repeat on one of its neighbors.
flavorText: "Throw it back! THROW IT BACK!"

name: Swampqueen Hagatha
text: Battlecry: Add a 5/5 Horror to your hand. Teach it two Shaman spells.
flavorText: Rafaam mainly enjoys working with Hagatha because she never laughs at Dr. Boom's jokes.

name: Al'Akir the Windlord
text: Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
flavorText: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords. And the other three don't let him forget it.

name: Walking Fountain
text: Lifesteal, Rush, Windfury
flavorText: The weirdest part is that it doesn't have legs.

name: Mogu Fleshshaper
text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each minion on the battlefield.
flavorText: He's here to shape *clap* you up!

name: Voidwalker
text: Taunt
flavorText: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

name: Blood Imp
text: Stealth. At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
flavorText: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.

name: Flame Imp
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Imps like being on fire. They just do.

name: Fiendish Servant
text: Deathrattle: Give this minion's Attack to a random friendly minion.
flavorText: Putting the "r" in fiend.

name: Spirit Jailer
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
flavorText: "Sure, they're in your deck, but the mind is like, the REAL prison."

name: Felstalker
text: Battlecry: Discard a random card.
flavorText: This puppy chews up cards instead of shoes.

name: EVIL Genius
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to add 2 random Lackeys to your hand.
flavorText: You do not want to be on the business end of this intellect!

name: Expired Merchant
text: Battlecry: Discard your highest Cost card. Deathrattle: Add 2 copies of it to your hand.
flavorText: The "best by" date is more like a guideline.

name: Darkglare
text: After your hero takes damage, refresh a Mana Crystal.
flavorText: He's got a dark glare, but he sees crystal clear!

name: Imprisoned Scrap Imp
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, give all minions in your hand +2/+1.
flavorText: His impish imports imply impressively impetuous impropriety.

name: Kanrethad Ebonlocke
text: Your Demons cost (1) less. Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kanrethad Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: After Illidan's downfall, Kanrethad formed the Council of the Black Harvest to study Illidan's fel magic. Some say he was... green with envy.

name: Boneweb Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/1 Spiders. If you discard this, trigger its Deathrattle.
flavorText: Noblegarden is going to be really exciting this year!

name: Midway Maniac
text: Taunt
flavorText: Faire owners hate him! Learn his secrets with one simple spell!

name: Felguard
text: Taunt Battlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
flavorText: Yes, he'll fight for you. BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

name: Void Terror
text: Battlecry: Destroy both adjacent minions and gain their Attack and Health.
flavorText: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

name: EVIL Recruiter
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly Lackey to summon a 5/5 Demon.
flavorText: I'm starting to think the lackeys aren't evil, just taken advantage of.

name: Neferset Thrasher
text: Whenever this attacks, deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Tough to do skateboard tricks with four legs.

name: Dragonblight Cultist
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond. Gain +1 Attack for each other friendly minion.
flavorText: Galakrond would be extra mad if he was resurrected with gnaw marks on his bones.

name: Chaos Gazer
text: Battlecry: Curse a playable card in your opponent's hand. They have 1 turn to play it!
flavorText: No matter the game rules, it's always playing Go Fish.

name: Shadowlight Scholar
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage.
flavorText: Imagine having the power of soul magic and using it as a reading light.

name: Man'ari Mosher
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Demon +3 Attack and Lifesteal this turn.
flavorText: "E.T.C. is sooo mainstream. Have you heard of Blight Boar?"

name: Revenant Rascal
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Mana Crystal for each player.
flavorText: Turns out his face really did get stuck that way.

name: Pit Lord
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

name: Summoning Portal
text: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
flavorText: NOT LESS THAN 1! Don't get any ideas!

name: Eager Underling
text: Deathrattle: Give two random friendly minions +2/+2.
flavorText: Eager to please, even if it kills him.

name: Diseased Vulture
text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, summon a random 3-Cost minion.
flavorText: He's off the twig! He's kicked the bucket! THIS IS AN EX-VULTURE!

name: Veiled Worshipper
text: Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, draw 3 cards.
flavorText: If you’re not wearing your regulation cultist clothing, how will Galakrond know to devour you last?

name: Nightshade Matron
text: Rush Battlecry: Discard your highest Cost card.
flavorText: Throws shade at those "high-cost" minions.

name: Fire Breather
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions except Demons.
flavorText: "Phew! That skull has been stuck between my teeth for hours!"

name: Dark Pharaoh Tekahn
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Lackeys are 4/4.
flavorText: He'll get that League of Explorers and their little murloc too!

name: Crazed Netherwing
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other characters.
flavorText: Always tail swipes left.

name: Void Drinker
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to gain +3/+3.
flavorText: It has no taste.

name: Envoy Rustwix
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle 3 random Prime Legendary minions into your deck.
flavorText: "Time to roll. Rusted Legion, ho!"

name: Dread Infernal
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
flavorText: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

name: Aranasi Broodmother
text: Taunt When you draw this, restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavorText: She's got a big brood and a big mood.

name: Riftcleaver
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Your hero takes damage equal to its Health.
flavorText: Brings you face to face with your destructive impulses.

name: Abyssal Summoner
text: Battlecry: Summon a Demon with Taunt and stats equal to your hand size.
flavorText: But gnomes have tiny hands...

name: Keli'dan the Breaker
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. If drawn this turn, instead destroy all minions except this one.
flavorText: He calms down a lot if you just give him a turn.

name: Ring Matron
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon two 3/2 Imps.
flavorText: But where does she keep them?

name: Tickatus
text: Battlecry: Remove the top 5 cards from your deck. Corrupt: Your opponent's deck instead.
flavorText: "These are all.... EXPIRED!"

name: Siegebreaker
text: Taunt Your other Demons have +1 Attack.
flavorText: Has a side hustle as a siegebroker.

name: Arch-Villain Rafaam
text: Taunt Battlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.
flavorText: Minions must wash hands before being LIQUIDATED AND REPLACED BY SOMEONE BETTER.

name: Valdris Felgorge
text: Battlecry: Increase your maximum hand size to 12. Draw 4 cards.
flavorText: I don't mean to pry, but you don't by chance happen to have six fingers on both of your hands?

name: Soulciologist Malicia
text: Battlecry: For each Soul Fragment in your deck, summon a 3/3 Soul with Rush. ( )
flavorText: If you value your life, don't call it a "soft science."

name: Fel Lord Betrug
text: Whenever you draw a minion, summon a copy with Rush that dies at end of turn.
flavorText: Nobody else likes rush hour.

name: Zzeraku the Warped
text: Whenever your hero takes damage, summon a 6/6 Nether Drake.
flavorText: The extra Z is for "zesty."

name: Enhanced Dreadlord
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Dreadlord with Lifesteal.
flavorText: Photo actually taken across the street in the reflection of a doorknob.

name: Archwitch Willow
text: Battlecry: Summon a random Demon from your hand and deck.
flavorText: One of the demons will do all the work while the other gets the same grade.

name: Lord Jaraxxus
text: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace it with Lord Jaraxxus.
flavorText: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

name: Jumbo Imp
text: Costs (1) less whenever a friendly Demon dies while this is in your hand.
flavorText: Jumbo in size! Huge in E.V.I.L.!

name: Sky Raider
text: Battlecry: Add a random Pirate to your hand.
flavorText: Maybe he should've hatched a plan that could actually carry booty back too.

name: Risky Skipper
text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavorText: Sworn enemy of the Safety Matey.

name: Imprisoned Gan'arg
text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, equip a 3/2 Axe.
flavorText: Factory Direct Fiery War Axe. Please allow two turns for delivery.

name: Armorsmith
text: Whenever a friendly minion takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
flavorText: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

name: Cruel Taskmaster
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavorText: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

name: Vicious Scraphound
text: Whenever this minion deals damage, gain that much Armor.
flavorText: It begs for scraps.

name: Frightened Flunky
text: Taunt Battlecry: Discover a Taunt minion.
flavorText: Some people just aren't cut out to be supervillain material.

name: Bumper Car
text: Rush Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Riders with Rush to your hand.
flavorText: Subject: Re: Unsafe Rides? bump

name: E.T.C., God of Metal
text: After a friendly Rush minion attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: There are Old Gods and then there are Rock Gods.

name: Stage Hand
text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: Holds everything himself because people wouldn't stop touching the prop table.

name: Warsong Commander
text: Your Charge minions have +1 Attack.
flavorText: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

name: Frothing Berserker
text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

name: Clockwork Goblin
text: Battlecry: Shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 5 damage.
flavorText: They always wind up bombing.

name: Bloodsworn Mercenary
text: Battlecry: Choose a damaged friendly minion. Summon a copy of it.
flavorText: You look really hurt. You could use a friend!

name: EVIL Quartermaster
text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand. Gain 3 Armor.
flavorText: He trained for a whole year to become quarter-master. Three more, and he'll be a full-master.

name: Skybarge
text: After you summon a Pirate, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: It's more of a ship-gun than a gunship.

name: Bomb Wrangler
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Boom Bot.
flavorText: Bomb Wranglers tend to have short fuses and even shorter lifespans.

name: Bonechewer Raider
text: Battlecry: If there is a damaged minion, gain +1/+1 and Rush.
flavorText: And if that minion has a frisbee, LOOK OUT!

name: Warmaul Challenger
text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Battle it to the death!
flavorText: Old gladiator rules: first one to die loses.

name: Playmaker
text: After you play a Rush minion, summon a copy  with 1 Health remaining.
flavorText: "Here's the plan: you go left, I go right, and the wounded guy takes the hit."

name: Ironclad
text: Battlecry: If your hero has Armor, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: With one inch of clearance, Ironclad proved ineffective against speedbumps.

name: Kor'kron Elite
text: Charge
flavorText: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

name: Arathi Weaponsmith
text: Battlecry: Equip a 2/2 weapon.
flavorText: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

name: Omega Devastator
text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, deal 10 damage to a minion.
flavorText: The Alpha Devastator didn’t devastate enough. The Beta Devastator devastated too much. But the Omega was just right!

name: Restless Mummy
text: Rush Reborn
flavorText: Life-separation anxiety syndrome.

name: Scion of Ruin
text: Rush. Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, summon 2 copies of this.
flavorText: Ruined! RUINED!

name: Kargath Bladefist
text: Rush Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kargath Prime' into your deck.
flavorText: He rules the Shattered Hand orc clan with an iron... bladefist.

name: Sword Eater
text: Taunt Battlecry: Equip a 3/2 Sword.
flavorText: How tough is he? He eats swords for breakfast! Without any milk.

name: Scrap Golem
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Gain Armor equal to this minion's Attack.
flavorText: Abuse, reuse, recycle.

name: Ringmaster Whatley
text: Battlecry: Draw a Mech, Dragon, and Pirate.
flavorText: His main qualification is that he'll work with anyone. Or anything.

name: Tent Trasher
text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each friendly minion with a unique minion type.
flavorText: "I consider it redecorating."

name: Armagedillo
text: Taunt At the end of your turn, give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavorText: We may never know what provoked it, but we will never forget the consequences.

name: Armored Goon
text: Whenever your hero attacks, gain 5 Armor.
flavorText: Armored except for non-critical areas, such as the head, torso, fists and thighs.

name: Blastmaster Boom
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots for each Bomb in your opponent's deck.
flavorText: He's gonna fly through the air with the greatest of grease.

name: Bloodboil Brute
text: Rush Costs (1) less for each damaged minion.
flavorText: Call Gurtogg a brute if you like, but no one else cares about the wounded like he does.

name: Grommash Hellscream
text: Charge Has +6 Attack while damaged.
flavorText: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes! Maybe not his best decision.

name: Tomb Warden
text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
flavorText: Also known as an ancient copy machine.

name: Deathwing, Mad Aspect
text: Battlecry: Attack ALL other minions.
flavorText: Bite that one, bite that other one, claw this one, swallow that one whole....

name: Troublemaker
text: At the end of your turn, summon two 3/3 Ruffians that attack random enemies.
flavorText: "Prepare for trouble!" "Make it double!"

name: Rattlegore
text: Deathrattle: Resummon this with -1/-1.
flavorText: He looks bad now, but he was pretty handsome in his 20/20s.

name: The Boom Reaver
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of a minion in your deck. Give it Rush.
flavorText: “What’s better than reaving? BOOM reaving!”

name: Wisp
flavorText: If you hit an Eredar Lord with enough Wisps, it will explode. But why?

name: Desk Imp
flavorText: "I feel inky!"

name: Elven Archer
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavorText: Don't bother asking her out on a date. She'll shoot you down.

name: Goldshire Footman
text: Taunt
flavorText: If 1/2 minions are all that is defending Goldshire, you would think it would have been overrun years ago.

name: Grimscale Oracle
text: Your other Murlocs have +1 Attack.
flavorText: These are the brainy murlocs. It turns out that doesn’t mean much.

name: Murloc Raider
flavorText: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

name: Stonetusk Boar
text: Charge
flavorText: This card is boaring.

name: Voodoo Doctor
text: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health.
flavorText: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

name: Abusive Sergeant
text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
flavorText: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!

name: Angry Chicken
text: Has +5 Attack while damaged.
flavorText: There is no beast more frightening (or ridiculous) than a fully enraged chicken.

name: Argent Squire
text: Divine Shield
flavorText: "I solemnly swear to uphold the Light, purge the world of darkness, and to eat only burritos." - The Argent Dawn Oath

name: Bloodsail Corsair
text: Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.
flavorText: Every pirate uses the same four digits to access Automated Gold Dispensers. It's called the "Pirate's Code".

name: Hungry Crab
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Murloc and gain +2/+2.
flavorText: Murloc. It's what's for dinner.

name: Leper Gnome
text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: He really just wants to be your friend, but the constant rejection is starting to really get to him.

name: Lightwarden
text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
flavorText: She’s smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.

name: Murloc Tidecaller
text: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

name: Secretkeeper
text: Whenever a Secret is played, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: Where is Mankrik’s wife? She’ll never tell.

name: Shieldbearer
text: Taunt
flavorText: Have you seen the size of the shields in this game?? This is no easy job.

name: Southsea Deckhand
text: Has Charge while you have a weapon equipped.
flavorText: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

name: Worgen Infiltrator
text: Stealth
flavorText: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

name: Young Dragonhawk
text: Windfury
flavorText: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.

name: Young Priestess
text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
flavorText: She can't wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.

name: Potion Vendor
text: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavorText: Everyone gets two because that’s all she can hold.

name: Toxfin
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Murloc Poisonous.
flavorText: I'm addicted to him, but I know that he's Toxfin.

name: Beaming Sidekick
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavorText: Sure, I'll carry the water! And the food! And the tents! And the cursed monkey paw!

name: Jar Dealer
text: Deathrattle: Add a random 1-Cost minion to your hand.
flavorText: What's in the jar? It could be anyone!

name: Mogu Cultist
text: Battlecry: If your board is full of Mogu Cultists, sacrifice them all and summon Highkeeper Ra.
flavorText: Mogu cultists have the worst team-building exercises.

name: Murmy
text: Reborn
flavorText: Unlike other mummies, they rolled him up with rice, sliced cucumbers, and soy sauce on the side.

name: Blazing Battlemage
flavorText: Weaponized an ancient technique once used to slice cold butter.

name: Depth Charge
text: At the start of your turn, deal 5 damage to ALL minions.
flavorText: * Does not have Charge.

name: Hot Air Balloon
text: At the start of your turn, gain +1 Health.
flavorText: The Gadgetzan Pilgrim's Bounty parade is missing a float this year.

name: Ethereal Augmerchant
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: According to him, undamaged minions just spell problems.

name: Guardian Augmerchant
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Divine Shield.
flavorText: "What doesn't kill you makes me money!"

name: Infectious Sporeling
text: After this damages a minion, turn it into an Infectious Sporeling.
flavorText: "The best thing about being me—there’s so many 'me's."

name: Rocket Augmerchant
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Rush.
flavorText: "Don't worry, this won't hurt me a bit."

name: Soulbound Ashtongue
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
flavorText: He claims to be "soulbound," but I just think he's clingy.

name: Animated Broomstick
text: Rush Battlecry: Give your other minions Rush.
flavorText: "Blimey, that's a Stratocumulus 1000!"

name: Intrepid Initiate
text: Spellburst: Gain +2 Attack.
flavorText: How you like them apples?

name: Pen Flinger
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage. Spellburst: Return this to your hand.
flavorText: The pen is also a more aerodynamic short-range projectile than the sword.

name: Tour Guide
text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power costs (0).
flavorText: "Here is the original blueprint for the Academy grounds! Don't mind those so-called dark chambers… They'll be at the end of the tour."

name: Wand Thief
text: Combo: Discover a Mage spell.
flavorText: "What’re ya buyin’?”

name: Armor Vendor
text: Battlecry: Give 4 Armor to each hero.
flavorText: "You look like the kind of person that would buy three sets of armor. One to wear, a spare, and a spare for the spare."

name: Safety Inspector
text: Battlecry: Shuffle the  lowest-Cost card from your hand into your deck. Draw a card.
flavorText: "All right, you're good. No sign of safety anywhere."

name: Acidic Swamp Ooze
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
flavorText: Oozes love Flamenco. Don't ask.

name: Bloodfen Raptor
flavorText: "Kill 30 raptors." - Hemet Nesingwary

name: Bluegill Warrior
text: Charge
flavorText: He just wants a hug. A sloppy... slimy... hug.

name: Frostwolf Grunt
text: Taunt
flavorText: Grunting is what his father did and his father before that. It's more than just a job.

name: Kobold Geomancer
text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

name: Murloc Tidehunter
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Murloc Scout.
flavorText: "Death will rise, from the tides!"

name: Novice Engineer
text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavorText: "Half of this class will not graduate… since they'll have been turned to chickens." - Tinkmaster Overspark, teaching Gizmos 101.

name: River Crocolisk
flavorText: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

name: Amani Berserker
text: Has +3 Attack while damaged.
flavorText: If an Amani berserker asks "Joo lookin' at me?!", the correct response is "Nah, mon".

name: Ancient Watcher
text: Can't attack.
flavorText: Why do its eyes seem to follow you as you walk by?

name: Bloodmage Thalnos
text: Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavorText: He's in charge of the Annual Scarlet Monastery Blood Drive!

name: Bloodsail Raider
text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack of your weapon.
flavorText: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

name: Crazed Alchemist
text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
flavorText: "You'll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you're not happy with your current number of limbs.

name: Dire Wolf Alpha
text: Adjacent minions have +1 Attack.
flavorText: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

name: Doomsayer
text: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.
flavorText: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

name: Faerie Dragon
text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavorText: Adorable. Immune to Magic. Doesn't pee on the rug. The perfect pet!

name: Knife Juggler
text: After you summon a minion, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: Ambitious Knife Jugglers sometimes graduate to Bomb Jugglers. They never last long enough to make it onto a card though.

name: Loot Hoarder
text: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavorText: Always roll need.

name: Lorewalker Cho
text: Whenever a player casts a spell, put a copy into the other player’s hand.
flavorText: Lorewalker Cho archives and shares tales from the land of Pandaria, but his favorite story is the one where Joey and Phoebe go on a road trip.

name: Mad Bomber
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split between all other characters.
flavorText: He's not really all that crazy, he is just not as careful with explosives as he should be.

name: Mana Addict
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack this turn.
flavorText: She’s trying to kick the habit, but still takes some mana whenever she has a stressful day.

name: Mana Wraith
text: ALL minions cost (1) more.
flavorText: They come out at night to eat leftover mana crystals. "Mmmmmm," they say.

name: Master Swordsmith
text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
flavorText: He's currently trying to craft a "flail-axe", but all the other swordsmiths say it can't be done.

name: Millhouse Manastorm
text: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (0) next turn.
flavorText: "I'm gonna light you up, sweetcheeks!"

name: Nat Pagle
text: At the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
flavorText: Nat Pagle, Azeroth's premier fisherman! He invented the Auto-Angler 3000, the Extendo-Pole 3000, and the Lure-o-matic 2099 (still in testing).

name: Pint-Sized Summoner
text: The first minion you play each turn costs (1) less.
flavorText: She's quite jealous of the Gallon-Sized Summoner.

name: Sunfury Protector
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Taunt.
flavorText: She carries a shield, but only so she can give it to someone she can stand behind.

name: Wild Pyromancer
text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
flavorText: BOOM BABY BOOM! BAD IS GOOD! DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

name: Youthful Brewmaster
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
flavorText: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews. Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!

name: Arcane Servant
flavorText: "Would sir like me to punch something?"

name: Dalaran Librarian
text: Battlecry: Silence adjacent minions.
flavorText: Don't make her raise her "shush"!

name: EVIL Cable Rat
text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand.
flavorText: Gradually driven to darkness by the promise of unobtainable cheese.

name: Hench-Clan Hogsteed
text: Rush Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Murloc.
flavorText: This is CLEARLY their first rodeo.

name: Mana Reservoir
text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: If it soaks too long, it becomes a reservoir hog.

name: Spellbook Binder
text: Battlecry: If you have Spell Damage, draw a card.
flavorText: You're bound to love his work!

name: Sunreaver Spy
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: She's watching. Always watching.

name: Zayle, Shadow Cloak
text: You start the game with one of Zayle's EVIL Decks!
flavorText: E.V.I.L. is the new black.

name: Bug Collector
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Locust with Rush.
flavorText: The only one who likes BEEEES!!!

name: Dwarven Archaeologist
text: After you Discover a card, reduce its cost by (1).
flavorText: She's making great progress on paying off that advanced degree.

name: Fishflinger
text: Battlecry: Add a random Murloc to each player's hand.
flavorText: The scent of fish lingers on the fishflinger's fish fingers.

name: Injured Tol'vir
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
flavorText: Me-OW!
