name: Kobold Sandtrooper
text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Stay while, take candle.

name: Neferset Ritualist
text: Battlecry: Restore adjacent minions to full Health.
flavorText: The Neferset are great—they'll always make sure their friends are feline fine.

name: Questing Explorer
text: Battlecry: If you control a Quest, draw a card.
flavorText: Earned her merit badges the hard way—twelve zhevra hooves at a time.

name: Quicksand Elemental
text: Battlecry: Give all enemy minions -2 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Use a light abrasive to buff blemishes away but use a heavy abrasive to debuff problems.

name: Serpent Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/4 Sea Serpent.
flavorText: These things go from "adorable danger noodle!" to "MY FACE IS MELTING!" all too quickly.

name: Spitting Camel
text: At the end of your turn,   deal 1 damage to another   random friendly minion.
flavorText: Were you expectorating another bad pun?

name: Temple Berserker
text: Reborn Has +2 Attack while damaged.
flavorText: He's back. He's angry. And he's here to wrap things up.

name: Vilefiend
text: Lifesteal
flavorText: Dreamed of becoming a Stylefiend, but fel was never in season.

name: Zephrys the Great
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, wish for the perfect card.
flavorText: "Of course it's perfect, you're just not seeing how to use it."

name: Dragon Breeder
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Dragon. Add a copy of it to your hand.
flavorText: Deathwing would have been more well-adjusted if he'd been raised by this guy.

name: Evasive Chimaera
text: Poisonous Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavorText: One head only tells the truth, while the other head only tells lies. But they both spit poison.

name: Grizzled Wizard
text: Battlecry: Swap Hero Powers with your opponent until your next turn.
flavorText: When he was young, he was an Outrageous Magus.

name: Parachute Brigand
text: After you play a Pirate, summon this minion from your hand.
flavorText: She flies standby.

name: Tasty Flyfish
text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +2/+2.
flavorText: Reinforced with vitamins and mrglrls.

name: Transmogrifier
text: Whenever you draw a card, transform it into a random Legendary minion.
flavorText: All it takes is some imagination and a cardboard box.

name: Wyrmrest Purifier
text: Battlecry: Transform all Neutral cards in your deck into random cards from your class.
flavorText: She keeps your deck classy.

name: Licensed Adventurer
text: Battlecry: If you control a Quest, add a Coin to your hand.
flavorText: "Just point me in the vague direction of the things you want smashed, and you got yourself a deal!"

name: Bonechewer Brawler
text: Taunt Whenever this minion takes  damage, gain +2 Attack.
flavorText: When you get this swole, arrows are basically free acupuncture.

name: Imprisoned Vilefiend
text: Dormant for 2 turns. Rush
flavorText: If you do the time, you gotta make up the time.

name: Mo'arg Artificer
text: All minions take double damage from spells.
flavorText: Double-damage. You know the drill.

name: Rustsworn Initiate
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Impcaster with Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: The Rusted Legion's training leaves a little to be desired. He hasn't even had a tetanus shot yet!

name: Cult Neophyte
text: Battlecry: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more next turn.
flavorText: Make a new recruit's deficiencies your efficiencies.

name: Manafeeder Panthara
text: Battlecry: If you've used your Hero Power this turn, draw a card.
flavorText: Feeds on mana, crystal kibble, and whatever it was you were just snacking on.

name: Sneaky Delinquent
text: Stealth. Deathrattle: Add a 3/1 Ghost with Stealth to your hand.
flavorText: All right, now open your lid and say "Ahh!"

name: Transfer Student
text: This has different effects based on which game board you're on.
flavorText: Oh, the places you'll go! There is so much to fight! There are boards to be explored. There are dreams to take flight.

name: Trick Totem
text: At the end of your turn, cast a random spell that costs (3) or less.
flavorText: It knows how to sit still and do tricks. Still working on rolling over, though.

name: Wandmaker
text: Battlecry: Add a 1-Cost spell from your class to your hand.
flavorText: She creates incredibly affordable wands of all shapes and sizes. But not owls. The owl is all-natural.

name: Costumed Entertainer
text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavorText: Just remember not to talk. It breaks character.

name: Crabrider
text: Rush Windfury
flavorText: "Now I'm falling asleep and she's calling a crab…"

name: Felfire Deadeye
text: Your Hero Power costs (1) less.
flavorText: She only shoots people who pet her cat without asking first.

name: Horrendous Growth
text: Corrupt: Gain +1/+1. Can be Corrupted endlessly.
flavorText: Stop picking at it! You’re only making it worse.

name: Imprisoned Phoenix
text: Dormant for 2 turns. Spell Damage +2
flavorText: It's actually pretty easy to escape chains when you can burst into flames.

name: Parade Leader
text: After you summon a Rush minion, give it +2 Attack.
flavorText: He's always going to reign on his parade.

name: Prize Vendor
text: Battlecry: Each player draws a card.
flavorText: He's just making sure they're real. Authentic tickets taste like strawberry.

name: Rock Rager
text: Taunt
flavorText: Still doesn't understand why he can't beat Paper Rager.

name: Showstopper
text: Deathrattle: Silence all minions.
flavorText: This act is killing it!

name: Wriggling Horror
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1.
flavorText: Created to scare. Born to wriggle.

name: Dalaran Mage
text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: You don't see a lot of Dalaran warriors.

name: Ironforge Rifleman
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavorText: "Ready! Aim! Drink!"

name: Ironfur Grizzly
text: Taunt
flavorText: "Bear Carcass 1/10"

name: Magma Rager
flavorText: He likes to think he is powerful, but pretty much anyone can solo Molten Core now.

name: Raid Leader
text: Your other minions have +1 Attack.
flavorText: "That's a 50 DKP minus!"

name: Razorfen Hunter
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Boar.
flavorText: Someone did mess with Tuskerr once. ONCE.

name: Shattered Sun Cleric
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1/+1.
flavorText: They always have a spare flask of Sunwell Energy Drink™!

name: Silverback Patriarch
text: Taunt
flavorText: He likes to act like he's in charge, but the silverback matriarch actually runs things.

name: Wolfrider
text: Charge
flavorText: Orcish raiders ride wolves because they are well adapted to harsh environments, and because they are soft and cuddly.

name: Alarm-o-Bot
text: At the start of your turn, swap this minion with a random one in your hand.
flavorText: WARNING. WARNING. WARNING.

name: Arcane Golem
text: Battlecry: Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
flavorText: Having Arcane golems at home really classes up the place, and as a bonus they are great conversation pieces.

name: Blood Knight
text: Battlecry: All minions lose Divine Shield. Gain +3/+3 for each Shield lost.
flavorText: The Blood Knights get their holy powers from the Sunwell, which you should NOT bathe in.

name: Brightwing
text: Battlecry: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
flavorText: Little faerie dragons are made of sugar and spice and maniacal vice.

name: Coldlight Seer
text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +2 Health.
flavorText: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths. So no, there's no getting away from murlocs.

name: Demolisher
text: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: Laying siege isn't fun for anyone. It's not even all that effective, now that everyone has a flying mount.

name: Earthen Ring Farseer
text: Battlecry: Restore 3 Health.
flavorText: He can see really far, and he doesn't use a telescope like those filthy pirates.

name: Emperor Cobra
text: Poisonous
flavorText: The Sholazar Basin is home to a lot of really horrible things. If you're going to visit, wear bug spray. And plate armor.

name: Flesheating Ghoul
text: Whenever a minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: 'Flesheating' is an unfair name. It's just that there's not really much else for him to eat.

name: Harvest Golem
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/1 Damaged Golem.
flavorText: "Overheat threshold exceeded. System failure. Wheat clog in port two. Shutting down."

name: Imp Master
text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to this minion and summon a 1/1 Imp.
flavorText: She would enjoy the job a lot more if she just could get the imps to QUIT BITING HER.

name: Injured Blademaster
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to HIMSELF.
flavorText: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

name: Ironbeak Owl
text: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavorText: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

name: Jungle Panther
text: Stealth
flavorText: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn't want to live there.

name: King Mukla
text: Battlecry: Give your opponent 2 Bananas.
flavorText: King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle, searching for love.

name: Murloc Warleader
text: Your other Murlocs have +2 Attack.
flavorText: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound? Nope! Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

name: Questing Adventurer
text: Whenever you play a card, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: "Does anyone have some extra Boar Pelts?"

name: Raging Worgen
text: Has +1 Attack and Windfury while damaged.
flavorText: If he's raging now, just wait until he gets nerfed.

name: Scarlet Crusader
text: Divine Shield
flavorText: Never wash your whites with a Scarlet Crusader.

name: Southsea Captain
text: Your other Pirates have +1/+1.
flavorText: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat. He has hat envy.

name: Tauren Warrior
text: Taunt Has +3 Attack while damaged.
flavorText: Tauren Warrior: Champion of Mulgore, Slayer of Quilboar, Rider of Thunderbluff Elevators.

name: Thrallmar Farseer
text: Windfury
flavorText: He's stationed in the Hellfire Peninsula, but he's hoping for a reassignment closer to Orgrimmar, or really anywhere the ground is less on fire.

name: Tinkmaster Overspark
text: Battlecry: Transform another random minion into a 5/5 Devilsaur or a 1/1 Squirrel.
flavorText: Tinkmaster Overspark nearly lost his Tinker's license after the Great Ironforge Squirrel Stampede of '09.

name: Arcane Watcher
text: Can't attack unless you have Spell Damage.
flavorText: Now his watch has ended… until you have Spell Damage.

name: Faceless Rager
text: Battlecry: Copy a friendly minion's Health.
flavorText: When you need to rage anonymously.

name: Flight Master
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Gryphon for each player.
flavorText: Your gryphon will be summoned following a brief safety demonstration.

name: Hench-Clan Sneak
text: Stealth
flavorText: He’d be a lot sneakier if he wasn’t trailing 300 yards of power cable…

name: Magic Carpet
text: After you play a 1-Cost minion, give it +1 Attack and Rush.
flavorText: Its small yet fierce riders are affectionately known as rug rats.

name: Spellward Jeweler
text: Battlecry: Your hero can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers until your next turn.
flavorText: The fanciest possible way of distracting enemies with shiny things.

name: Candletaker
text: Reborn
flavorText: "You no waaaake caaaandle!"

name: Desert Hare
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Desert Hares.
flavorText: After they're caught, they’re dessert hares.

name: Generous Mummy
text: Reborn Your opponent's cards cost (1) less.
flavorText: Yeah, she's mummified, but her money hasn’t dried up!

name: Golden Scarab
text: Battlecry: Discover a 4-Cost card.
flavorText: Who actually puts all the gold plating on these things, and why?

name: History Buff
text: Whenever you play a minion, give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavorText: Actually... what happened was...

name: Infested Goblin
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Scarabs with Taunt to your hand.
flavorText: Trust us. DON'T go cheap on the scarab repellent.

name: Mischief Maker
text: Battlecry: Swap the top card of your deck with your opponent's.
flavorText: Fair trade is for noble-minded suckers with dignity and honor.

name: Vulpera Scoundrel
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell or pick a mystery choice.
flavorText: A spell is a spell, but the mystery choice could be anything! (It's also a spell.)

name: Blowtorch Saboteur
text: Battlecry: Your opponent's next Hero Power costs (3).
flavorText: Before he came along, we went through a lot of duct tape.

name: Dread Raven
text: Has +3 Attack for each other Dread Raven you control.
flavorText: Fun Fact: A group of three Dread Ravens is an unkindness. Four is lethal!

name: Fire Hawk
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each card in your opponent's hand.
flavorText: It’s our fault for making all those card backs that look like food.

name: Goboglide Tech
text: Battlecry: If you control a Mech, gain +1/+1 and Rush.
flavorText: The word "glide" is always in quotes in the manual.

name: Living Dragonbreath
text: Your minions can't be Frozen.
flavorText: If you want that muscular physique, you've really gotta feel the burn.

name: Scalerider
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 2 damage.
flavorText: Do Re Me Fa So La Spear Throw!

name: Skydiving Instructor
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1-Cost minion from your deck.
flavorText: "Is it dangerous?" "For me? Not at all. Now jump!"

name: Blistering Rot
text: At the end of your turn, summon a Rot with stats equal to this minion's.
flavorText: Known as 'Fel Gel' to the Illidari, it's excellent protection against harsh Draenic sunshine.

name: Frozen Shadoweaver
text: Battlecry: Freeze an enemy.
flavorText: She still wears her Frozen Shadoweave set despite the many, many nerfs. She just can't let it go!

name: Overconfident Orc
text: Taunt While at full Health, this has +2 Attack.
flavorText: "I am da powerful! You are da poop!"

name: Teron Gorefiend
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other friendly minions. Deathrattle: Resummon them with +1/+1.
flavorText: "You’re fine, friendly minions! You're fine! Don’t tell Mom!"

name: Terrorguard Escapee
text: Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Huntresses for your opponent.
flavorText: Poor guy is terrified, look at his faces.

name: Educated Elekk
text: Whenever a spell is played, this minion remembers it. Deathrattle: Shuffle the spells into your deck.
flavorText: "This reminds me of a saying. 'An elekk never…' something. I can't remember."

name: Enchanted Cauldron
text: Spellburst: Cast a random spell of the same Cost.
flavorText: Do you smell what the cauldron is cooking? If so, we apologize.

name: Robes of Protection
text: Your minions have "Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers."
flavorText: Warning: Robes of Protection are intended for targeted effects only and are not an effective defense against Flamestrike, Twisting Nether, or other AOE attacks.

name: Speaker Gidra
text: Rush, Windfury Spellburst: Gain Attack and Health equal to the spell's Cost.
flavorText: If a teacher lectures in a forest, does she even make a sound?

name: Voracious Reader
text: At the end of your turn, draw until you have 3 cards.
flavorText: But how much of it is skimming?

name: Banana Vendor
text: Battlecry: Add 2 Bananas to each player's hand.
flavorText: There's always money in the banana stand.

name: Darkmoon Dirigible
text: Divine Shield Corrupt: Gain Rush.
flavorText: "It's dirigible? I don’t even know what diriging is!"

name: Darkmoon Statue
text: Your other minions have +1 Attack. Corrupt: This gains +4 Attack.
flavorText: As far as workplace injuries go, Silas is protected by his statue of limitations.

name: Deathwarden
text: Deathrattles can't trigger.
flavorText: Ride or die takes on a new meaning.

name: Gyreworm
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 3 damage.
flavorText: This game of ring toss just got really intense.

name: Inconspicuous Rider
text: Battlecry: Cast a Secret from your deck.
flavorText: Improvise, adapt, overcome.

name: K'thir Ritualist
text: Taunt Battlecry: Add a random 4-Cost minion to your opponent's hand.
flavorText: Something evil this way comes… and it's bringing friends over!

name: Luckysoul Hoarder
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck. Corrupt: Draw a card.
flavorText: Always brings his own reusable shopping bag, satchel, barrel, trunk, tray, and fluffy pillow.

name: Chillwind Yeti
flavorText: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

name: Dragonling Mechanic
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Mechanical Dragonling.
flavorText: She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

name: Gnomish Inventor
text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavorText: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

name: Oasis Snapjaw
flavorText: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

name: Ogre Magi
text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
text: Taunt
flavorText: Sen'jin Village is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

name: Stormwind Knight
text: Charge
flavorText: They're still embarrassed about "The Deathwing Incident".

name: Ancient Brewmaster
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
flavorText: Most pandaren say his brew tastes like yak. But apparently that's a compliment.

name: Ancient Mage
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: Sometimes he forgets and just wanders into someone else's game.

name: Cult Master
text: After a friendly minion dies, draw a card.
flavorText: She may be an evil cult master, but she still calls her parents once a week.

name: Dark Iron Dwarf
text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore. Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.

name: Defender of Argus
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Taunt.
flavorText: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending. But it does.

name: Dread Corsair
text: Taunt Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
flavorText: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

name: Mogu'shan Warden
text: Taunt
flavorText: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King. BOOOORRRINNG!

name: SI:7 Infiltrator
text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy Secret.
flavorText: What will she destroy? It’s a secret!

name: Silvermoon Guardian
text: Divine Shield
flavorText: The first time they tried to guard Silvermoon against the scourge, it didn’t go so well…

name: Twilight Drake
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
flavorText: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy. And Tacos.

name: Violet Teacher
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
flavorText: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig. And then you get your name on the board.

name: Archmage Vargoth
text: At the end of your turn, cast a spell you've cast this turn (targets are random).
flavorText: He's an archmage, but he might want to brush up on the basics... like aiming.

name: Hecklebot
text: Taunt Battlecry: Your opponent summons a minion from their deck.
flavorText: Built by goblins, designed by a troll.

name: Hench-Clan Hag
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Amalgams with all minion types.
flavorText: The Hench Clan is an equal opportunity employer, no matter which parts of you came from where.

name: Portal Keeper
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
flavorText: No longer allowed to be “it” when playing demon tag.

name: Proud Defender
text: Taunt Has +2 Attack while you have no other minions.
flavorText: It'll take a humble offender to defeat him.

name: Soldier of Fortune
text: Whenever this minion attacks, give your opponent a Coin.
flavorText: His allies call him invaluable.

name: Traveling Healer
text: Divine Shield Battlecry: Restore 3 Health.
flavorText: Some heroes have soft hearts and hard shells.

name: Violet Spellsword
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each spell in your hand.
flavorText: If you have to wield a spell and a sword, then neither is performing to expectation.

name: Body Wrapper
text: Battlecry: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Shuffle it into your deck.
flavorText: She uses pickle slices for the eyes. Keeps them well-preserved.

name: Bone Wraith
text: Taunt Reborn
flavorText: It uses only the eco-friendly bones from free-range humanoids.

name: Conjured Mirage
text: Taunt At the start of your turn, shuffle this minion into your deck.
flavorText: What you see is Isiset.

name: Sunstruck Henchman
text: At the start of your turn, this has a 50% chance to fall asleep.
flavorText: There is E.V.I.L. here that DOES sleep.

name: Bad Luck Albatross
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle two 1/1 Albatross into your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Legend holds that it's bad luck to harm it. So maybe just pat it on the head, okay?

name: Devoted Maniac
text: Rush Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavorText: There are plenty of apathetic maniacs, but they couldn't be bothered.

name: Dragonmaw Poacher
text: Battlecry: If your opponent controls a Dragon, gain +4/+4 and Rush.
flavorText: I prefer my dragons over-easy.

name: Evasive Feywing
text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavorText: I've never heard of this fey-dragon called "Brightwing," but if I HAD, I’d say we’d be best friends.

name: Frizz Kindleroost
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Dragons in your deck by (2).
flavorText: Frizz knows that baby dragons need warmth, care, and the highest possible level of goblin engineering.

name: Hippogryph
text: Rush Taunt
flavorText: Known for its ferocious grace, the hippogryph is a truly majestic creature. Except when molting.

name: Hoard Pillager
text: Battlecry: Equip one of your destroyed weapons.
flavorText: Better to have stabbed and lost. And then found again!

name: Troll Batrider
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavorText: "Quiet! The bat can't hear where he's goin'!"

name: Wing Commander
text: Has +2 Attack for each Dragon in your hand.
flavorText: "Flap! Flap! FLAP!"

name: Zul'Drak Ritualist
text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon three random 1-Cost minions for your opponent.
flavorText: Generosity is a core value in cult culture.

name: Escaped Manasaber
text: Stealth Whenever this attacks, gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavorText: Captive manasabers don't behave much better--they're always scratching your furniture and coughing up mana balls.

name: Frenzied Felwing
text: Costs (1) less for each damage dealt to your opponent this turn.
flavorText: Not to be confused with the "friendsy” felwing.

name: Grand Lackey Erkh
text: After you play a Lackey, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavorText: Esteemed leader of Rafaam's Inhuman Resources department.

name: Sky Gen'ral Kragg
text: Taunt Battlecry: If you've played a Quest this game, summon a 4/2 Parrot with Rush.
flavorText: He's gunning for Sky Adm'ral.

name: Burrowing Scorpid
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. If that kills the target, gain Stealth.
flavorText: It's a game of hide and go sting.

name: Disguised Wanderer
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 9/1 Inquisitor.
flavorText: He wanders east... always into the east.

name: Felfin Navigator
text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +1/+1.
flavorText: Return my fishes to me, and I myself shall carry you to the gates of Mrrhalla!

name: Magtheridon
text: Dormant. Battlecry: Summon three 1/3 enemy Warders. When they die, destroy all minions and awaken.
flavorText: Came from another world to invade Outland and bend it to his will… only to be overthrown by an elf from another world who invaded Outland and bent it to his will.

name: Maiev Shadowsong
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. It goes Dormant for 2 turns.
flavorText: Go directly to Demon Jail. Do not attack minions, do not collect mana crystals.

name: Replicat-o-tron
text: At the end of your turn, transform a neighbor into a copy of this.
flavorText: According to the Boom Labs sales brochure, it "impractically makes itself!"

name: Rustsworn Cultist
text: Battlecry: Give your other minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Demon."
flavorText: "Rust… I love it. It's all coarse, and rough, and irritating. And it gets everywhere."

name: Crimson Hothead
text: Spellburst: Gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavorText: Has a real passion for spelling.

name: Divine Rager
text: Divine Shield
flavorText: For when you need to rage, rage against the dying of the Light.

name: Fishy Flyer
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Add a 4/3 Ghost with Rush to your hand.
flavorText: Like a fish out of water.

name: Steeldancer
text: Battlecry: Summon a random minion with Cost equal to your weapon's Attack.
flavorText: Pretty powerful if you blade your cards right.

name: Wretched Tutor
text: Spellburst: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavorText: "If you like my tutoring, you'll love my sister the art therapist, my father the driver, and my mother the housekeeper."

name: Circus Amalgam
text: Taunt This has all minion types.
flavorText: Who needs a petting zoo when you have all the creatures right here?!

name: Circus Medic
text: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health. Corrupt: Deal 4 damage instead.
flavorText: Just be careful not to mix this with any creepy eyeballs, tentacles, or dark whispers, and you'll be fine in the morning.

name: Fantastic Firebird
text: Windfury
flavorText: The original flaming chicken.

name: Knife Vendor
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to each hero.
flavorText: "They're perfectly safe! These gloves totally aren't hiding any bandages."

name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
text: Taunt
flavorText: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

name: Darkscale Healer
text: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavorText: Healing is just something she does in her free time. It's more of a hobby really.

name: Frostwolf Warlord
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion on the battlefield.
flavorText: The Frostwolves are locked in combat with the Stormpike Expedition over control of Alterac Valley. Every attempt at peace-talks has ended with Captain Galvangar killing the mediator.

name: Gurubashi Berserker
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3 Attack.
flavorText: No Pain, No Gain.

name: Nightblade
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Your face is the place you'd probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

name: Stormpike Commando
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.
flavorText: The Stormpike Commandos are demolition experts. They also bake a mean cupcake.

name: Abomination
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to ALL characters.
flavorText: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

name: Big Game Hunter
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 7 or more Attack.
flavorText: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him. Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

name: Captain Greenskin
text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1/+1.
flavorText: He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren't for those pesky kids!

name: Faceless Manipulator
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion and become a copy of it.
flavorText: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.

name: Fen Creeper
text: Taunt
flavorText: He used to be called Bog Beast, but it confused people because he wasn't an actual beast. Boom, New Name!

name: Harrison Jones
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability.
flavorText: “That belongs in the Hall of Explorers!”

name: Silver Hand Knight
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Squire.
flavorText: It's good to be a knight. Less so to be one's squire.

name: Spiteful Smith
text: Your weapon has +2 Attack while this is damaged.
flavorText: She'll craft you a sword, but you'll need to bring her 5 Steel Ingots, 3 Motes of Earth, and the scalp of her last customer.

name: Stampeding Kodo
text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
flavorText: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.

name: Stranglethorn Tiger
text: Stealth
flavorText: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

name: Venture Co. Mercenary
text: Your minions cost (3) more.
flavorText: No Job is too big. No fee is too big.

name: Azerite Elemental
text: At the start of your turn, gain Spell Damage +2.
flavorText: This is some bad blood.

name: Barista Lynchen
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of each of your other Battlecry minions to your hand.
flavorText: "Thanks a latte!"

name: Dalaran Crusader
text: Divine Shield
flavorText: Stops for nothing—except donuts.

name: Recurring Villain
text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 4 or more Attack, resummon it.
flavorText: Mwahahaha! You'll never catch him this time!

name: Sunreaver Warmage
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, deal 4 damage.
flavorText: What, did you expect the Sunreavers to be coldages?

name: Desert Obelisk
text: If you control 3 of these at the end of your turn, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: The Obelisk of the Stars can hide an entire land from prying eyes! Or zap a rando.

name: Faceless Lurker
text: Taunt Battlecry: Double this minion's Health.
flavorText: Longtime lurker, first time attacker.

name: Mortuary Machine
text: After your opponent plays a minion, give it Reborn.
flavorText: The ankle bone's connected to the shin bone. The knuckle bone's connected to the... eh, it'll be fine.

name: Phalanx Commander
text: Your Taunt minions have +2 Attack.
flavorText: Turns out he's really good at herding cats.

name: Wasteland Assassin
text: Stealth Reborn
flavorText: They'll never see me coming, what with my glowing body, eyes and daggers.

name: Big Ol' Whelp
text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavorText: A chonker, a real absolute unit.

name: Chromatic Egg
text: Battlecry: Secretly Discover a Dragon to hatch into. Deathrattle: Hatch!
flavorText: Nefarian was known for creating two things: horrible monsters and excellent breakfasts.

name: Cobalt Spellkin
text: Battlecry: Add two 1-Cost spells from your class to your hand.
flavorText: Spews more spells than a sleep-talking wizard.

name: Faceless Corruptor
text: Rush. Battlecry: Transform one of your minions into a copy of this.
flavorText: What does Madame Lazul have against faces?!

name: Kobold Stickyfinger
text: Battlecry: Steal your opponent's weapon.
flavorText: He no take candle. He take sword.

name: Platebreaker
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's Armor.
flavorText: Worst. Dinner guest. Ever.

name: Shield of Galakrond
text: Taunt Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavorText: Realistically, she's the shield for Galakrond's big toe.

name: Skyfin
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon 2 random Murlocs.
flavorText: "Do you want to be a murloc or a dragon?" "Yes."

name: Tentacled Menace
text: Battlecry: Each player draws a card. Swap their Costs.
flavorText: He calls this one the "Calamari Special."

name: Boompistol Bully
text: Battlecry: Enemy Battlecry cards cost (5) more next turn.
flavorText: Preventing insults with injuries.

name: Hailbringer
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Ice Shards that Freeze.
flavorText: Knows every way to greet someone.

name: Al'ar
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 0/3 Ashes of Al'ar that resurrects this minion on your next turn.
flavorText: Week 679: Still no mount...

name: Ruststeed Raider
text: Taunt, Rush Battlecry: Gain +4 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Three-time winner (and sole survivor) of the Crashes of Outland motocross!

name: Waste Warden
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a minion and all others of the same minion type.
flavorText: Recycle that can, or you get the cuffs!

name: Doctor Krastinov
text: Rush Whenever this attacks, give your weapon +1/+1.
flavorText: He is not a medical doctor.

name: Headmaster Kel'Thuzad
text: Spellburst: If the spell destroys any minions, summon them.
flavorText: "You wish to know my secrets, hmm? I carry little bits of tuna in the sleeves of my robe, he loves that. Oh, you meant the risen dead? That was trivial, trivial."

name: Jandice Barov
text: Battlecry: Summon two random 5-Cost minions. Secretly pick one that dies  when it takes damage.
flavorText: Her parents own Scholomance. Of course she's going to play tricks on the students!

name: Lake Thresher
text: Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavorText: "There’s a monster in the lake?!" "That’s not a monster, that’s Gary."

name: Lorekeeper Polkelt
text: Battlecry: Reorder your deck from the highest Cost card to the lowest Cost card.
flavorText: quicksort [] = [] quicksort (x:xs) = quicksort small ++ (x : quicksort large) where small = [y | y <- xs, y <= x] large = [y | y <- xs, y > x]

name: Ogremancer
text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a 2/2 Skeleton with Taunt.
flavorText: After their third attempt, Tharg began to suspect that Krul was summoning the skeletons on purpose.

name: Ras Frostwhisper
text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemies (improved by Spell Damage).
flavorText: Always the favorite of Headmaster Kel'Thuzad, Ras nonetheless received a chilly reception from the other faculty.

name: Steward of Scrolls
text: Spell Damage +1 Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavorText: Oh dang it, I spilled ink elemental all over my essay!

name: Vectus
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps. Each gains a Deathrattle from your minions that died this game.
flavorText: Don’t let that dark magic worry you. He’ll ensure they hatch without a scratch.

name: Derailed Coaster
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Rider with Rush for each minion in your hand.
flavorText: So long as it doesn’t kill you, it's considered part of the ride "experience."

name: Fleethoof Pearltusk
text: Rush Corrupt: Gain +4/+4.
flavorText: Guest interactions may vary over the duration of the visit.

name: Keywarden Ivory
text: Battlecry: Discover a dual-class spell from any class. Spellburst: Get another copy.
flavorText: She learned exactly one thing from her old man: copying.

name: Moonfang
text: Can only take 1 damage at a time.
flavorText: Moonforehead just didn't have the same ring to it.

name: Optimistic Ogre
text: 50% chance to attack the correct enemy.
flavorText: "What if this goes wrong?" "But what if this goes right?"

name: Archmage
text: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.

name: Boulderfist Ogre
flavorText: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

name: Lord of the Arena
text: Taunt
flavorText: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

name: Reckless Rocketeer
text: Charge
flavorText: One Insane Rocketeer. One Rocket full of Explosives. Infinite Fun.

name: Argent Commander
text: Charge Divine Shield
flavorText: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

name: Cairne Bloodhoof
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/5 Baine Bloodhoof.
flavorText: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck. It's pretty insensitive.

name: Frost Elemental
text: Battlecry: Freeze a character.
flavorText: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
flavorText: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

name: Hogger
text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
flavorText: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

name: Priestess of Elune
text: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavorText: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

name: Sunwalker
text: Taunt Divine Shield
flavorText: She doesn’t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun. It's just a name. Don’t worry!

name: The Beast
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.
flavorText: He lives in Blackrock Mountain. He eats Gnomes. That's pretty much it.

name: The Black Knight
text: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Taunt.
flavorText: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament. We can pretty much mark that a failure.

name: Windfury Harpy
text: Windfury
flavorText: Harpies are not pleasant sounding. That's the nicest I can put it.

name: Xavius
text: After you play a card, summon a 2/1 Satyr.
flavorText: Xavius has grand nightmares of summoning Sargeras into this world, but a few Satyr will have to do for now.

name: Eccentric Scribe
text: Deathrattle: Summon four 1/1 Vengeful Scrolls.
flavorText: Them’s fightin’ words!

name: Mad Summoner
text: Battlecry: Fill each player's board with 1/1 Imps.
flavorText: Does he summon because of his madness, or is he mad from all the summoning?

name: Portal Overfiend
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
flavorText: It’s like an interdimensional game of demon tag.

name: Safeguard
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 0/5 Vault Safe with Taunt.
flavorText: Keep it secret. Keep it safeguarded!

name: Unseen Saboteur
text: Battlecry: Your opponent casts a random spell from their hand (targets chosen randomly).
flavorText: Far more effective than the flamboyant saboteur.

name: Violet Warden
text: Taunt Spell Damage +1
flavorText: He's got magic, a shield, and an unwavering obsession with the color purple.

name: Blatant Decoy
text: Deathrattle: Each player summons the lowest Cost minion from their hand.
flavorText: "Hah! You is being tricked by ME! Togwaggle!"

name: Khartut Defender
text: Taunt, Reborn Deathrattle: Restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Gesundheit!

name: Camouflaged Dirigible
text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs Stealth until your next turn.
flavorText: "What does that cloud look like to you?" "Trouble."

name: Evasive Wyrm
text: Divine Shield, Rush Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavorText: Deftly dodges spells like a real wiggle wyrm.

name: Gyrocopter
text: Rush Windfury
flavorText: The hula doll is still absolutely required.

name: Kronx Dragonhoof
text: Battlecry: Draw Galakrond. If you're already Galakrond, unleash a Devastation.
flavorText: The only one who knows how to properly prepare Galakrond's coffee.

name: Utgarde Grapplesniper
text: Battlecry: Both players draw a card. If it's a Dragon, summon it.
flavorText: Note: The dragon may be a little cranky upon arrival.

name: Dragonmaw Sky Stalker
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/4 Dragonrider.
flavorText: "I will find you, sky!"

name: Scavenging Shivarra
text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split among all other minions.
flavorText: Say what you want but finding a matching set of six swords takes commitment.

name: Onyx Magescribe
text: Spellburst: Add 2 random spells from your class to your hand.
flavorText: Sometimes you gotta spend spells to earn spells.

name: Smug Senior
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Add a 5/7 Ghost with Taunt to your hand.
flavorText: You want to see something funny? Go visit him in five years.

name: Sorcerous Substitute
text: Battlecry: If you have Spell Damage, summon a copy of this.
flavorText: This substitute's substitution is a dangerous institution.

name: Claw Machine
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Draw a minion and give it +3/+3.
flavorText: "I have been mrglrlglr… chosen!"

name: Core Hound
flavorText: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

name: Stormwind Champion
text: Your other minions have +1/+1.
flavorText: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

name: War Golem
flavorText: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them. Instinct, maybe? A desire to blend in?

name: Baron Geddon
text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
flavorText: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

name: Barrens Stablehand
text: Battlecry: Summon a random Beast.
flavorText: It’s never Huffer.

name: High Inquisitor Whitemane
text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly minions that died this turn.
flavorText: No one told her that champions want to sleep in.

name: Ravenholdt Assassin
text: Stealth
flavorText: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold. He'll take care of the rest.

name: Chef Nomi
text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, summon six 6/6 Greasefire Elementals.
flavorText: His cooking is always very well done.

name: Exotic Mountseller
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random 3-Cost Beast.
flavorText: *Taps roof of mammoth* “You can fit so many squirrels in this thing!”

name: Tunnel Blaster
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all minions.
flavorText: And you always thought they wore the candles just for fun.

name: Underbelly Ooze
text: After this minion survives damage, summon a copy of it.
flavorText: It's always accepting of the less successful adventurers.

name: Siamat
text: Battlecry: Gain 2 of Rush, Taunt, Divine Shield, or Windfury (your choice).
flavorText: TAUNT. TAUNT.

name: Wasteland Scorpid
text: Poisonous
flavorText: After they get to a certain size, it doesn't matter if they're poisonous or not.

name: Wrapped Golem
text: Reborn At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
flavorText: The end result of one of the greatest wrap battles of all time.

name: Evasive Drakonid
text: Taunt Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavorText: Doesn't respond to spells, hero powers, calls, or text messages.

name: Shu'ma
text: At the end of your turn, fill your board with 1/1 Tentacles.
flavorText: How to tell your mother to go away.

name: Bonechewer Vanguard
text: Taunt Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +2 Attack.
flavorText: She came here to taunt you and chew on bones, and she's all outta bones.

name: Kael'thas Sunstrider
text: Every third spell you cast each turn costs (1).
flavorText: “Descent of Dragons was merely a set back!”

name: Keymaster Alabaster
text: Whenever your opponent  draws a card, add a copy to   your hand that costs (1).
flavorText: The key to his mastery is a solid stack of backup copies.

name: Silas Darkmoon
text: Battlecry: Choose a direction to rotate all minions.
flavorText: "You might remember me from such attractions as 'Being Shot out of a Cannon' or 'That Carousel Ate My Friend.'"

name: Strongman
text: Taunt Corrupt: This costs (0).
flavorText: Sure, it looks impressive until you realize it's a barrel of helium.

name: Arcane Devourer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: Likes her magic with a pinch of salt.

name: Gruul
text: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .
flavorText: He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller". He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

name: Batterhead
text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
flavorText: When it comes to problem-solving, he always uses his head.

name: Heroic Innkeeper
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for each other friendly minion.
flavorText: We reserve the right to refuse service to any 1/1.

name: Jepetto Joybuzz
text: Battlecry: Draw 2 minions from your deck. Set their Attack, Health, and Cost to 1.
flavorText: “I’m a real toy now!”

name: Whirlwind Tempest
text: Your minions with Windfury have Mega-Windfury.
flavorText: And your minions with mega-windfury get... dizzy.

name: Octosari
text: Deathrattle: Draw 8 cards.
flavorText: Eight arms of sand-flinging, foe-wringing, card-slinging fury!

name: Pit Crocolisk
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage.
flavorText: PIT! Not PET!

name: Twin Tyrant
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavorText: They can never agree on whether it's too hot or too cold.

name: Supreme Abyssal
text: Can't attack heroes.
flavorText: Yet, you still feel attacked.

name: Plagued Protodrake
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 7-Cost minion.
flavorText: "What’s in the drake?! WHAT’S IN THE DRAKE?"

name: Alexstrasza
text: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
flavorText: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone. Except Deathwing. And Malygos. And Nekros.

name: Malygos
text: Spell Damage +5
flavorText: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic. He gets so mad!

name: Nozdormu
text: Players only have 15 seconds to take their turns.
flavorText: Time to write some flavor text.

name: Onyxia
text: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
flavorText: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor. You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

name: Ysera
text: At the end of your turn, add a Dream Card to your hand.
flavorText: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream. Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

name: Archivist Elysiana
text: Battlecry: Discover 5 cards. Replace your deck with 2 copies of each.
flavorText: Your deck is just another organizational challenge to her.

name: Burly Shovelfist
text: Rush
flavorText: Shovel beats paper and rock!

name: Anubisath Warbringer
text: Deathrattle: Give all minions in your hand +3/+3.
flavorText: Some dogs will bring you a bone or a squeaky toy. This one brings war!

name: Dragonqueen Alexstrasza
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, add 2 other random Dragons to your hand. They cost (1).
flavorText: Givin' lives and takin' names.

name: Sathrovarr
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a copy of it to your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavorText: Just wait until you also find a copy in your pocket. And your desk! And your FRIDGE!!

name: Carnival Clown
text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon 2 copies of this. Corrupt: Fill your board with copies.
flavorText: Send in the clowns!

name: Runaway Blackwing
text: At the end of your turn, deal 9 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavorText: It has been 5 minutes since our last Azeroth Racing League violation.

name: Deathwing
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your hand.
flavorText: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated. Daddy issues?

name: Sea Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.
flavorText: See? Giant.

name: Big Bad Archmage
text: At the end of your turn, summon a random 6-Cost minion.
flavorText: "My, my, what big minions I have!"

name: Colossus of the Moon
text: Divine Shield Reborn
flavorText: Strike him down, and you'll face the Colossus of the New Moon.

name: King Phaoris
text: Battlecry: For each spell in your hand, summon a random minion of the same Cost.
flavorText: When you're the king of the cats, the whole desert is your litterbox.

name: Living Monument
text: Taunt
flavorText: This is not the greatest card in the world. This is just a monument.

name: Scrapyard Colossus
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 7/7 Felcracked Colossus with Taunt.
flavorText: Heap on heapin' on.

name: C'Thun, the Shattered
text: Start of Game: Break into pieces. Battlecry: Deal 30 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavorText: My grandfather's deck has no useless cards!

name: Darkmoon Rabbit
text: Rush, Poisonous Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavorText: That's no ordinary rabbit! That's the most foul, cruel, and bad-tempered rodent you ever set eyes on!

name: N'Zoth, God of the Deep
text: Battlecry: Resurrect a friendly minion of each minion type.
flavorText: It really just wants to cuddle all the creatures of Azeroth.

name: Y'Shaarj, the Defiler
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of each Corrupted card you've played this game to your hand. They cost (0) this turn.
flavorText: Y'Shaarj made an excellent office intern, doing the copying AND defiling.

name: Yogg-Saron, Master of Fate
text: Battlecry: If you've cast 10 spells this game, spin the Wheel of Yogg-Saron. ( left!) (Ready!)
flavorText: Yogg take the wheel!
